headline: DevOps Engineer to Curity
description.text:
Awesome. We are looking for an engineer that wants to be part of a highly skilled international team, are eager to learn and passionate about high quality IT-services.

About Curity

Curity helps larger organisations to improve their infrastructure, making it easier for the customer to build digital services and securing millions of users' access to web and mobile apps. Starting off as a consulting company, Curity quickly moved on to become an IT-security company composed of experienced developers and security experts. Though claiming to be a startup, Curity has moved pass several stages and consists of a driven team, an unique product and has joined forces with some of the biggest companies in Europe. Today, Curity is the leading provider of API-driven identity management in Europe. Curity is speeding up growth by completing an investment led by Fairpoint Capital, an offshoot of one of Sweden’s largest banks. 

Curity Identity Server is the world's most powerful OAuth and OpenID Connect Server; it is used for logging in and securing millions of users' access to web and mobile apps that consume APIs and Micro Services. Curity is built upon open standards and designed for development and operations. They enjoy the trust of large organizations in financial services, telecom, retail, energy and government services with operations across many countries which have chosen Curity for their enterprise-grade API security needs.

As a truly international company, Curity can offer you the diversity and the opportunities of the world. On top of that, it's a people-friendly culture and in addition to benefits like health care insurance and great pension package, Curity also offers flexible work hours and the ability to work partly remote. 

What you’ll do

As a DevOps Engineer you will belong to the core engineering team and be working with the developers, product management and the marketing team. You will manage Curity's environments and ensure their product is easily used in cloud-native environments. You will develop, operate and maintain the CI/CD infrastructure, tools and websites and work together with their core developers for container-based deployments of the Curity product running in their customers' environments. You will automate away dull tasks and actively contribute to the technical strategies and solutions for the Curity product. Work activities will include:

Develop, operate and maintain their build and continuous integration systemsRun and operate Curity's and Nordic APIs' external facing websitesProvide cloud-native support in the Curity product based upon Kubernetes and the likesAct as a key player in making Curity's release process more efficient

Who you are

We believe that you have at least four years of experience in a similar role as a DevOps Engineer with programming/scripting skills in languages such as Java, Groovy, Gradle, Python, Kotlin and/or Bash. You have knowledge of server and deployment technologies such as Linux, Jenkins, Git, Bitbucket and Jira. You are familiar with cloud-based infrastructure setup and environments and you have a general understanding of microservice architecture. As you will have a leading role in the work for container-based deployments of the Curity product, previous experience working with Kubernetes and Docker is a plus. 

Apply here

Does this position sound interesting? Please apply through our webpage as soon as possible as the recruitment process takes place on regular basis. 

Stockholm Headhunting has since 2019-10-04 changed name to Grooo. We continue with the same business as before but under a different name.

headline: DevOps Queen or King
description.text:
Plingot AB is looking to hire...

DevOpsQueen or King. Would you like to work for a company founded and driven by
developers? Would you like to build something used by many users and with a
wide reach? Would you like to work in a team that exclusively consists of
developers, with everyone involved in the decision-making processes?


Since we have an ongoing selection process, please send in your application as
soon as possible.



Arbetsuppgifter

You will manage Plingot cloud infrastructure both for internal use and in some cases on behalf of our global, industry leading clients. You will also be in charge of maintaining our CI/CD pipelines and other similar devops tools. Your work will consist of approximately 80% coding and 20% discussion, code reviews and monitoring. Your work will take place in our headquarters in Växjö.

Qualifications
If you have a big interest in coding, with strong attention to details in order to deliver high quality, this might be the right position for you. You enjoy working in teams and value collaboration, but you are also able to work independently and deliver high quality results.

We expect you to be fluent in both spoken and written English. 

Preferred skills are:
- Spoken and written Swedish
- AWS EC2 experience
- Familiar with AWS VPC:s and routing tables

- CircleCI or equivalent
- Bash, Python, Ruby, Javascript - any type of scripting experience is a plus

Competencies/Profile
You are detail-oriented, structured and independent. You feel joy when you deliver high quality results, and finding new solutions makes you proud. You communicate with clarity and simplicity. You build and maintain good customer relationships and you are able to create a productive cooperation by reliability, expertise and solution focus. And of course, we expect you to be passionate about programming!

What we offer
We offer a workplace founded and driven by developers. A job in a creative, developing and modern work environment, with stimulating tasks, great co-workers and the possibility to take up a big responsibility.

Our office is located in Växjö and the company consists of three people. We work with industry-leading companies and we focus on high quality solutions.

We will agree on working hours and start date.

headline: DevOps - Camera Lab
description.text:
WHAT IS AXIS?
Axis is a fast growing and innovative Swedish company with a global footprint. Our success is largely due to our highly skilled staff and our strong culture of daring to succeed and allowing ourselves to constantly break new ground. We allow and promote independent thinking!

We are now looking for a jack of all trades camera lab co-responsible to join our R&D Tools team.

THE R&D TOOLS TEAM
We develop and maintain the tools to compile, test, and publish the software that goes into Axis' products. We strive to improve developers' productivity and relieve them of mundane tasks by providing a continuous integration pipeline that builds and tests their changes on dozens of Axis cameras in our labs and makes it easy for them to analyze any test failures.

We have a close relationship with stakeholders throughout the organization so that the build and test environment we provide supports how they want to work.

WHAT WILL YOU DO?
Our tools team needs further strengthening in the camera lab.

You will primarily perform development and maintenance of our camera lab and secure that we evolve towards and automated environment.

In detail you will:

 * Install and maintain the cameras in use by the function teams
 * Develop systems supporting remote debugging, power cycling, simulation and so forth
 * Provide an infrastructure for highly available, automated lab infrastructure
 * Perform trouble shooting and customer support
 * Drive continuous improvement of the lab


You will also….

 * Bridge the gap between tools and development

WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR?
You troubleshoot and solve problems efficiently and in a timely fashion.

Together with the team you make the necessary changes whilst listening to organizational needs and sharing your thoughts and ideas in a productive and efficient way.

Qualification and experience:

 * A master's or bachelor's degree in computer science (or similar)

 * Quality and customer focused
 * Scripting (e.g. shell, Python, Go)
 * Hardware interest

Bonus if you have extra skills like:

 * Contribution to open source projects
 * Knowledge in how to set up complex lab environments
 * IT infrastructure (network, storage, configuration, deployment, virtualization)

 * Large scale software integration



WHAT AXIS CAN DO FOR YOU?
This is a great opportunity to use and develop your skills as part of an exciting, successful organization that is already the world leader in network video. You will work with technologically advanced products in a team of experienced engineers. In exchange for your dedication Axis can offer you an innovative and global environment where you can develop both as a professional and as an individual.

We welcome your application and look forward to the possibility of you joining us!

READY TO ACT?
Ready to join the world's best tools team?

Axis is a company realizing the benefits of a diverse workforce. We know that diversity in groups creates a better working environment and promotes creativity, something that is fundamental for our success. Would you like to grow with us?

headline: Automation & DevOps Engineer
description.text:
We are looking for a software developer with passion for automation. With an innovative mind and excellent troubleshooting skills you can make a difference in many of our critical projects.

Your role

You will be a member of the engineering team responsible for our delivery pipeline. This is an important area, involving both small and large projects, creating a useful development environment with great performance. When you see an area of improvement, you and your team will get it done.

Tasks will include:

 * Develop and maintain a detailed understanding of our systems
 * Design and implement new solutions
 * Integrate and verify specific system requirements
 * System configuration and management
 * Identify, sequence, and prioritize tasks in consultation with the Team/Projects
 * Troubleshooting

Would you like to know more about the Saab-life and the benefits of joining us? 

Your profile

You are used to efficiently collaborating with team members as well as other stakeholders. You are structured and have a confident mindset enabling you to adapt to circumstances.

Required skills:

 * Bachelor degree in engineering, computer science, or another technical field
 * Minimum three years of relevant experience
 * Excellent communication skills in English, verbal and written
 *

Experience with complex software systems
 *



Desired skills:


 * Experience with project tracking tools such as JIRA
 * Experience in working within the AGILE software development methodology
 * Experience in programming in Python

This position requires that you will be approved in a security screening in accordance with the Swedish Protective Security Act.

What you will be a part of

You will collaborate with experienced engineers and professionals in an environment that fosters career development and personal growth. You will be part of the Automation Team in the Software Engineering Unit, who develops the future development, build and continuous integration platform. Software Engineering is a part of the Business Area Surveillance

We pride ourselves on a nurturing environment, where everyone is different yet we share the same goal - to help protect people.

headline: Devops Engineer to Pricer
description.text:
In a rapidly growing and ever-changing retail market, Pricer offers technology and solutions that fundamentally change the traditional retail business towards increased e-commerce and dynamic pricing. As a global leader and partner on the stores’ digitalization journey, Pricer contributes to more efficient store management. This means freeing up time that store employees can spend on increased service and a better buying experience for shoppers. With confidence from major retail chains around the world, Pricer has so far sold 200 million electronic shelf labels to 16.500 stores in more than 50 countries.



Who are you and what will you do? We believe you're an experienced developer with a broad technical background and a burning interest for devops. As a person you have great communication skills and are able to collaborate with coworkers on all levels of our organization.





We believe you have the following experience:

  3 years of Java Development



  Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment

  Virtualization tools such as Docker

  Pipeline tools such as TeamCity

  Deployment and automation tools such as Anisble, Chef or Puppet

It's also great if you have experience in any of the following:



  ELK Stack



Why Pricer?

At Pricer you get to work in a truly global and multicultural environment with driven and highly skilled colleagues. You will be working in our office right next to Stockholm City central station together with passionate colleagues in a flat and creative environment, using cutting edge technology. We offer flexible working hours and a clear focus on individual growth, for example by Lab Fridays where everyone gets an opportunity to let their creativity flow!



Sounds interesting?

Don’t hesitate on applying today, selections and interviews occur continuously which means the position may be filled at any time.

headline: SEB trainee: DevOps Engineer
description.text:
Working as a DevOps Engineer and participating in SEB’s International Trainee Programme will give you a unique opportunity to develop your professional skills in a modern and innovative company. In your role at the Technology Department you will, during the trainee programme, focus on building an extensive network with colleagues all over SEB. You will use your network and gather cross-functional teams, where IT and business collaborate to find innovative solutions. If you have an interest in developing software and are motivated to drive change – this is the right setting for you!

OUR OFFER TO YOU

As a trainee at SEB you will get the opportunity to develop an extensive network and gain a deep understanding of the financial industry as well as being professionally and personally challenged.

We offer you:

 • A nine months trainee programme, designed for professional and personal development

 • Opportunity to work for SEB abroad in connection with the programme (personal option)
 • Full-time employment with market based salary and access to SEB´s employee benefits

YOUR TRAINEE POSITION AND YOUR TEAM

As a DevOps Engineer, you will lead cross-functional teams who are working with initiatives having the goal to develop new digital solutions for SEB´s customers. In this role you will take part in the software progress at SEB, as well as driving the digital development in the financial industry.

You will be managing initiatives by using tech development tools such as Jira, Jenkins, Openshift, Splunk, Elastic and Cloud. You will also be responsible for getting people to work together in a creative and communicative way. Our way of working is agile coaching, development of processes and delivery quality as well as producing technical ideas and solutions.



"If you think your skills in technology can help us build a better bank, this is the place for you! You will gain insights in how we can use DevOps in our development of digital solutions to provide better solutions to our clients!"

WE WANT YOU!

We are looking for people who can challenge us and we will do everything we can for you to get a kick-start career in SEB. In return, we ask for this:

 • a master´s degree in Engineering combined with Business, Industrial Engineering Management or equivalent
 • you are, or will soon graduate and have some work experience


It is not a requirement but a plus if you have experience acquired through leading projects, have worked within customer service or other service areas and studied/worked abroad.

You are a creative producer with innovative ideas and a solution oriented mindset. In this role, you will be able to use your creative skills in a collaborative environment. You will take responsibility and act to make things happen in order to reach specific goals in the progressing initiatives. Being curious about forming new digital solutions and possibilities will help you in this inventive role.

Welcome to SEB!

INTERESTED?
SEB collaborates with TNG in this recruitment process. They are recruitment specialists in unbiased and competency based recruitment and help us do a neutral and fair selection. If you are interested to become a trainee at SEB apply easily by adding your CV or LinkedIn profile at TNG´s application form, no personal letter is needed. We look forward to receiving your application as soon as possible, at the latest January the 5th. If you have any questions, please contact the recruiter. But please note that we cannot accept applications via email. Talk to you soon!Find out more about the recruitment process at: https://www.tng.se/seb-trainee-program

headline: Malmö: DevOps Cloud Engineer
description.text:
Här letar vi efter dig som vill implementera, konfigurera och supportera Cloud-lösningar samt arbeta med ständig förfining och förbättring genom CI/CD-processer. Du har specialiserad teknisk kompetens inom en eller flera molntekniker samt gärna en eller flera traditionella infrastrukturtekniker. Vill du vara med på vår framgångsresa? Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag.

ARBETSUPPGIFTER
Vi söker dig som vill jobba som konsult i intressanta kunduppdrag. Du kommer bland annat att arbeta med design, implementation, transformation, drift, support och optimering. Målet är hela tiden att som expert ge bäst möjliga rådgivning och därigenom optimera användarupplevelse, prestanda och kostnaderna för utveckling, drift- och systemförvaltning. Eftersom vårt molnerbjudande är under uppbyggnad kommer du att spela en viktig roll i teamet och har goda möjligheter att påverka. Beroende på uppdrag kommer du att jobba både självständigt och i team.

UTBILDNING/ERFARENHET
Med största sannolikhet jobbar du med någon molnteknik redan idag och har kanske även bakgrund som specialist inom en eller flera infrastrukturtekniker. Vi ser positivt på om du är certifierad alternativt har ett engagemang för att ta relevanta certifieringar framöver. Du har djupa kunskaper och erfarenhet inom ett eller flera av nedanstående områden:

DevOps
AWS

Microsoft Azure
Office 365
Automatisering av processer inom cloud operations, scriptning
Storage, Network, Security, Virtualisering
Utveckling
Som person är du serviceinriktad, sätter alltid kunden i fokus och strävar efter att hitta den bästa lösningen. Du har god problemlösningsförmåga, behärskar både svenska  och  engelska i tal och skrift samt trivs i konsultrollen. Du vill självklart alltid hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste molnteknikerna. Du trivs också i ett entreprenörsdrivet bolag, delar gärna med dig av din kunskap, är ödmjuk och trivs med att arbeta i team.


Vi erbjuder en balanserad och samtidigt snabbfotad, rolig och inspirerande arbetsplats med stor laganda. Hos oss jobbar du för att göra skillnad och för att utveckla både vår egen verksamhet och våra kunders.

Vår affärsidé är att erbjuda stora och medelstora företag i Norden specialistkompetens med fokus på molntjänster och förändringsprojekt. Vi erbjuder vår kompetens hela vägen från specifika konsultuppdrag inom digital transformation till ett totalansvar för våra kunders IT i molnet.

Hos oss möts du av härliga kollegor, kreativt arbete, intressanta kunder och utrymme för att dela med dig av din kunskap. Vi hjälper och inspirerar varandra i jobbet samtidigt som vi satsar mycket på individuell kompetensutveckling.

Urval och intervjuer sker löpande!

headline: DevOps .Net & Azure
description.text:
Ta möjligheten att få arbeta i en internationell miljö där vi skapar hållbara lösningar och underlättar internationell handel och dessutom hjälper våra kunder att utveckla deras verksamhet. KGH är för tredje året i rad utsett till ett av hundra karriärföretag i Sverige där du som medarbetare har stort förtroende och goda utvecklingsmöjligheter.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z36nkCo6-s0

Din vardag som devops

Som devops ansvarar du för planering, design, konfiguration och testning av all programvara innan release.

Du ger bästa möjliga rådgivning och optimerar användarupplevelse, prestanda och kostnaderna för utveckling, drift- och systemförvaltning.

Du arbetar med att automatisera och se till så att den kontinuerliga leveransen flyter på. I detta arbete använder du verktyg som standardiserar byggen, övervakar system eller spårar förändringar genom miljöerna.

Som person har du ett stort tekniskt intresse och ser till att allt fungerar smidigt för våra webbapplikationer.

Vem är du?

För att passa in i rollen som devops ser vi att du trivs i att vara kontaktytan mellan utvecklingsteamet och driftsorganisationen där du förstår teknologin både ur ett utvecklings- samt driftsperspektiv.

Vi ser att du har:

3 års erfarenhet i devopsrollenLätt för att kommunicera med olika typer av kompetenser, både i tal och skriftGod teknisk kunskap där du snabbt kan identifiera och driva de bästa lösningarnaStort eget driv och viljan att leverera med hög kvalitetKan växla mellan att vara detaljorienterad till att fokusera mer på helhetsbildenÄr flytande i engelska och svenska både i skrift och tal

Teknikstacken består i huvudsak av

.Net core 3KubernetesDockersAzureGraph QL

För oss är din personlighet mycket viktig och vi värdesätter nyfikenhet, flexibilitet och förmågan att samarbeta. Vi tror att du tycker om att ta eget ansvar och fokuserar på att leverera.

Om du ser utrymme för förbättringar antingen internt eller för våra kunder tar du initiativ till det. Du trivs med de tekniska utmaningarna i att analysera, designa och integrera system. I gengäld erbjuder vi dig utmanande uppgifter i en stimulerande miljö där du är en viktig del i utvecklingen av vårt företag.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/Tt3vG2AP1mw


Established in 1963, KGH has grown to become the largest independent European provider of international trade and customs solutions and services.

Today, we offer a comprehensive range of innovative solutions and services to over 28,000 customers each year across Europe. We are more than 750 colleagues operating in 13 countries. Our business model and customer offering addresses strategy and compliance, operations and digitalisation opportunities. This breadth and depth of capabilities and geographical coverage make us unique compared to competition.

headline: Utvecklare inom DevOps till Tieto
description.text: Här får du möjlighet att utvecklas hos en arbetsgivare som ligger i framkant inom branschen.Tieto i Umeå söker nu dig som vill arbeta som utvecklare mot DevOps.   Har du erfarenheter av Linux och vill ta nästa kliv i IT-branschen?I den här tjänsten får du arbeta med nya verktyg och metoder som ligger i framkant!Sök tjänsten redan idag då urval och intervjuer sker löpande.   Information om tjänsten   Professionals Nord söker för Tietos räkning Utvecklare mot DevOps.   Uppdraget är en del av vår personaluthyrning.Du kommer vara anställd av Professionals Nord och arbeta som konsult hos Tieto.Intentionen är att du efter 12 månader ska bli anställd direkt hos dem, förutsatt att alla parter är nöjda med samarbetet.      Professionals Nord har stark lokal kännedom och tillsammans med oss blir du en viktig representant som bidrar till ett starkare Norrland!   Arbetsuppgifter   Tieto i Umeå har i dagsläget större projekt där du kommer arbeta i team med att automatiskera och orkestrera för flertal kunder.Tieto arbetar agilt i små team och följer ITIL i leveranser och driftåtagande.   I den här tjänsten som back-end utvecklare har du stora utvecklingsmöjligheter där du kommer att få lära dig av erfarna och duktiga kollegor.Vidare erbjuder Tieto en arbetsplats som ligger i framkant inom moderna arbetsmetoder och utveckling.   Vi söker dig som   •	Har ett brinnande intresse för back-end, ( HW, OS, Nät och Middleware).   •	God kompetens av operativsystemen Linux och/eller Windows.   •	Erfarenhet av DevOps-verktyg   •	Meriterande att du har erfarenheter av konfiguration och skriptning.   Antingen ser vi att du inhämtat dina erfarenheter genom utbildning eller arbetslivet.Tjänsten kommer att anpassas efter dina tidigare erfarenheter och hos Tieto finns många duktiga kollegor att ta lärdom av.   Vi tror att dina personliga egenskaper är avgörande för hur väl du kommer trivas i rollen hos Tieto.   Du är serviceinriktad och har intresset av att ha kundkontakt dagligen.Vidare är du engagerad och har ett driv av att lära dig branschen.   START: Omgående, enligt överenskommelse   OMFATTNING: Heltid   STAD: Umeå   URVAL: Sker löpande      Sök tjänsten genom att klicka på ”sök jobbet” nedan.Vi går igenom urvalet löpande och kan därför ha gått vidare med kandidater innan annonsen stängs ner.Om du vill kan du även skapa en användare och ladda upp ditt CV och personliga brev.   Information om kundföretaget   Tietos mål är att vara kundernas förstahandsval för affärsförnyelse och det ledande mjukvaru- och tjänsteföretaget i Norden.   I en snabbt föränderlig värld kan varje bit av information användas för att skapa nytt värde.Tieto vill omsätta möjligheterna i den datadrivna världen till värde för människor, företag och samhället i stort.Vi har idag en framträdande roll i det digitala ekosystemet och använder vår mjukvara och våra tjänster för att skapa verktyg och lösningar som förenklar vardagen för miljontals människor, hjälper kunder att förnya sin affär genom att fånga möjligheterna med modernisering, digitalisering och innovation och som skapar nya möjligheter baserat på öppenhet, innovationssamarbeten och ekosystem.   Om oss   Vi vet av erfarenhet att du som medarbetare är den viktigaste resursen för företagen.Därför arbetar vi med kvalité och personlig matchning till alla våra tjänster för att hitta rätt jobb för dig.Vi satsar på att skapa och bibehålla arbetstillfällen i Norrland genom personaluthyrning och rekrytering.Hos Professionals Nord finns en gedigen branscherfarenhet och en gemensam vision – För ett starkare Norrland!Läs mer om oss på www.professionalsnord.se.

headline: DevOps Engineer - digital distribution
description.text: Are you a skilled DevOps with a passion for live services and gaming?Do you want to work in a fast paced environment with smooth and established processes?How about being part of a really skilled team who are currently changing the way digital distribution works on a global scale?Join our development team at Exertis Ztorm!      We at Exertis Ztorm are a hard working and passionate team with high ambitions and goals.Using our state-of-the-art digital distribution service we enable sales of top gaming and software brands through a global network of API-connected retailers, both online and in-store.The Ztorm service is the spider in the web between Game/Software publishers, retailers, and providers.The publishers we work with include EA, Ubisoft, Microsoft, SEGA, Bethesda, Rockstar, Adobe, to name a few.On the retailer side we have Humble Bundle, Newegg, CDON, Elkjöp, GAME and many more.Providers we integrate with include Origin, Uplay, Xbox, Symantec, etc.      Our vision is to provide a one-stop-shop for digital distribution, and we want to surround ourselves with sharp, driven people with a growth mindset who can contribute to our continuous development and innovation.Join our team in Stockholm and we promise you an exciting (and sometimes a bit crazy) journey with some office gaming tournaments along the way!      As DevOps at Exertis Ztorm, you are an important member of our expansion and development team.You have a proactive approach to your work and you have in-depth knowledge of your area.As DevOps, you will work with our highly skilled, experienced, and humble development team in all areas related to technical operations with an ambition to automate everything.You report directly to the Technical Director.      As DevOps you will      - Support our production systems and applications in AWS   - Be part of the software development process to help align software and system design   - Suggest best practice for platform architecture, scaling, hosting, monitoring, provisioning and deployment   - Work with infrastructure-as-code to automate systems   - Work with toolchains for deployment to increase quality and traceability   - Grow, learn, and support your colleagues in their effort to do the same   - Offer on-site support for office network issues   - Develop routines, standards, and processes      Your skills and experience      -  3+ years experience from platform architecture, configuration, management, and security with AWS, Azure or Google   - 3+ years experience with provisioning and change management with chef, puppet, terraform, etc.   - 3+ years experience with deploying and managing live applications (e.g.Java, PHP)   - 3+ years experience of database management (e.g.MySQL)   - 3+ years experience with advanced local and wide area networking in the areas of routing, firewalls, load balancers and switches   - Experience in all aspects of DevOps work including Continuous Development, Testing, Integration, Deployment, Monitoring   - Advanced scripting skill in Bash, Python, Java, Ruby or similar languages   - Experienced user in tools like Gitlab, Jenkins, Nexus, Maven, Jira, Confluence   - Some experience with container orchestration with tools like Kubernetes   - BSc in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent      Application      Tell us a bit about yourself and why you see Exertis Ztorm as your future workplace.Please attach your resume and/or Linkedin profile.Apply through the link below.      Our recruitment partner UrbanUrban (https://www.urbanurban.se/) manages our recruitment and will handle all applications for this process.Please note that you can only apply through the link, not through email.      Exertis Ztorm is part of a the Exertis group, a group of technology companies owned by DCC plc.      AWS, Chef, Ruby, Python, DevOps, Automation, CI/CD, Network Administration, Kubernetes, Agile

headline: DevOps Software Engineer till Mycronic
description.text: Tänk dig de mest högteknologiska elektronikprodukterna du kan föreställa dig, och sen tänker du ett steg längre.Vilken teknik skapar dagens mest högteknologiska produkter?Mycronics gör.Med världsledande produktionslösningar leder de elektronikindustrin men med en ödmjukhet inför att det viktigaste för att lyckas med detta är en passion för såväl affärer som teknik och framförallt människor - något som gör att de investerar mycket i dig som medarbetare.Är du rätt person att leda Mycronics fortsatta DevOps-arbete?Läs vidare!   OM TJÄNSTEN   DevOps Engineer-rollen är ny hos Mycronic och huvuduppgiften kommer att vara att jobba nära leveransteamen för att stötta dem i att enklare kunna leverera mjukvaran.Just nu finns tre mjukvarugrupper hos Mycronic och du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med både utvecklare och testare med varierad erfarenhetsnivå.Förutom samarbete med dina teamkollegor kommer du även arbeta nära de andra mjukvaruteamen och avdelningarna på Mycronic samt kollegor globalt.På sikt kan rollen även innebära resande runt om till Mycronics övriga kontor i världen.   Den här rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work men du kommer att anställas direkt hos Mycronic.   ARBETSUPPGIFTER   Du ingår i ett team om 14 personer som designar och utformar mjukvaran för ett flertal av Mycronics maskiner och de används som en del i Mycronics fabrikslösning för att kunna erbjuda en komplett kundlösning.En viktig del i din roll kommer även vara att sätta dig in i de andra mjukvaruteamens arbete för att kunna stötta dem i deras arbete och identifiera möjligheter att förbättra leveranserna av mjukvarukomponenter.   * Leda mjukvaruautomation och mjukvarukonfigurering enligt Mycronics visioner   * Designa, utveckla och underhålla teknikstacken (DevOps)   * Identifiera brister i releaseprocessen och planera åtgärder   * Designa och konstruera ”health checks, single point of failure and notification”   * Säkerställa leveranskvalitet genom tätt samarbete med leveransteamen, ex. delta vid teammöten etc.   * Etablera och kommunicera ”roadmaps” för mjukvaruautomation   VI SÖKER DIG SOM   * Har en akademisk utbildning inom exempelvis datavetenskap, datateknik, elektronik eller liknande   * Har flerårig erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling där du varit ansvarig för utvecklingsprojekt från start till mål   * Har erfarenhet från DevOps-projekt   * Har mycket goda kunskaper i Python   * Har förståelse för mjukvarans livscykel   * Goda kunskaper i engelska då språket används dagligen i arbetet   Det är meriterande om du har...   * Kunskaper i Docker, Jenkins, Artifactory och Kubernetes   Vi tror att du är en person som har flerårig erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling och känner dig redo att ta nästa steg i karriären där du får fördjupa dina kunskaper inom automatisering och konfiguration.Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga kompetenser och de som vi ser som särskilt viktiga i denna roll är:   * Resultatinriktad   * Relationsskapande   * Strukturerad   * Problemlösande   ÖVRIG INFORMATION   * Start: Enligt överenskommelse   * Omfattning: Heltid   * Placering: Täby   * Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work och Mycronics önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten hanteras av Academic Work.      Vi går igenom urvalet löpande och annonsen kan stängas ner innan tjänsten är tillsatt om vi gått över till urvals- och intervjufasen.   INFORMATION OM FÖRETAGET   Mycronic är ett svenskt högteknologiskt företag med runt 1000 anställda personer världen över.De arbetar med utveckling, tillverkning och marknadsföring av högteknologisk produktionsutrustning för elektronik och bildskärmsprodukter.Som en del av Mycronic ges du möjligheten att tillhöra att lönsamt och växande företag med en öppen arbetskultur och kunniga kollegor.De lägger vikt vid att dela kunskap med varandra för att öka kundvärdet och hela tiden driva innovationen framåt.Med alla deras olika perspektiv, bakgrunder och kunskaper gör de det omöjliga möjligt, igen och igen.Och det är med deras tre kärnvärden – Passion for business, Passion for technology och Passion for people, som driver och förenar dem över hela världen.

headline: Big Data and Devops Engineer
description.text: Unibet is one of the fastest growing online gaming operators in Europe with industry leading Sportsbook, Casino and Games, Poker and Bingo products via desktop, tablet and mobile.Our brand promise is built on the motto "By Players, For Players" putting customers at the centre of our business!   Founded in 1997 Unibet now employs over 1000 people in four main locations; Malta, London, Stockholm and Gibraltar.We’re always looking for talented people to come and join us, details of our live vacancies can be found on our careers website.   We look to employee passionate, friendly experts who are customer centric in their thinking - find our what people say about working here on our careers site or the independent Glassdoor reviews.   Today, Unibet has over 10 million customers in over 100 countries.Unibet is listed on NASDAQ OMX Nordic Exchange in Stockholm, more information about Unibet Group plc can be found on www.unibetgroupplc.com.We're looking for someone with the following skills, knowledge and experience   -Excellent hands-on working experience with Hadoop ecosystem for at least 4 years including HDFS, kafka, Spark, Splunk, Pig, Hive, Oozie, Zookeeper, Flume   -Excellent hands-on working experience with Python/Shell Scripting and Linux/Unix   -Well versed in installing, upgrading & managing distributions of Hortonworks, Cassandra, Elastic Search.   -Experience in Managing large-scale, secure, highly-available Hadoop infrastructure supporting rapid data growth for multiple internal customers.Install operating system and Hadoop updates, patches, Version upgrades.BIG DATA AND DEVOPS ENGINEER   Location: Stockholm or London      Department: Big Data   Hours of work: Fulltime   Role description   We are looking for someone to take on the role as BigData Dev-ops engineer for our BigData team.   This is a great opportunity for you who is passionate about and has experience with building and maintaining an Enterprise BigData Platform and solution.The goal is to make sure we have a top-class BigData platform technically and when it comes to 24/7 platform available and application deployment.   The BigData team is one of three teams in the Data department.The other two are BI & DWH team.The team consists of 8 people, responsible for building and maintaining a BigData platform and services in HDP,Datastax, ElasticSearch.We work with product owners who helps us to work according to the right business priorities.   The BigData is a key team for the Unibet group that is being used across different groups.We have an increased focus on the data area and there are lots of interesting challenges coming up related to scaling up, finding new ways of doing things, how to use new data technologies and enable data as a revenue driver for the company to a larger extent.   Key accountabilities of this role are   -Design, implement and maintain enterprise-level security (Kerberos, Active Directory, etc.)   -Troubleshoot Hadoop related applications, components and infrastructure issues at large scale   -Create run books for troubleshooting, cluster recovery and routine cluster maintenance   -3rd-Level-Support (DevOps) for business-critical applications and use cases   -Closely working with infrastructure, network units   -Cluster node configuration, connectivity, capacity, name node/data node/job tracker deployment layout, server requirements, SAN, RAID configurations etc.   We're looking for someone with the following skills, knowledge and experience   -Excellent hands-on working experience with Hadoop ecosystem for at least 4 years including HDFS, kafka, Spark, Splunk, Pig, Hive, Oozie, Zookeeper, Flume   -Excellent hands-on working experience with Python/Shell Scripting and Linux/Unix   -Well versed in installing, upgrading & managing distributions of Hortonworks, Cassandra, Elastic Search.   -Experience in Managing large-scale, secure, highly-available Hadoop infrastructure supporting rapid data growth for multiple internal customers.Install operating system and Hadoop updates, patches, Version upgrades   -Application process   To apply for this role click on the link.   https://team.unibet.com/vacancy/big-data-and-devops-engineer-tec0309/1406/description/

headline: DevOps Engineer - New Games
description.text: DevOps Engineer - SGT   The Stockholm Game Technology (SGT) team supports the new games studio in our collaborative studio mission to create and launch the next billion dollar franchise.The team collaborates with game teams as well as shared tech teams in order to create and maintain the tech that enables the future of King's mobile game development.   Your role within our Kingdom   As our DevOps Engineer, you will be a part of a team with a mission to build and maintain technology to support the studio in creating our new franchises.This includes evaluating existing tech, developing new creative solutions for our build pipeline, investigating problems reported by the game teams and coaching our game teams.You will work in close collaboration with our game teams and enjoy a creative, challenging and collaborative workplace where your ideas will be every bit as valued as your DevOps expertise.   You will work in a dynamic environment where work is driven by the requirements of the game teams which might include adapting to studio portfolio changes.Therefore you should be a fast learner with a positive attitude and a strong passion for working with new technology.You're excited about doing what's best for the games and adaptable enough to work on different things day to day based on their needs.   Skills to create thrills   You have a great passion for DevOps engineering, new technologies, large scale systems and games.You’re an excellent communicator, happy dealing with people from different business units and with varying degrees of technical savviness.Therefore, you’re able to translate business needs to technical requirements and implementation.   Experience with the Unity build system   CI/CD build tools like JenkinsTask & build automation tools like GradleRepo systems like Artifactory, NPM, VerdaccioImproving team workflows via automation (Probot, Github and Slack integrations, notifications and alerts)The mindset of writing tests along with the application code of projects, building up a healthy test coverageExperience with SplunkExperience with Kubernetes, Helm and DockerExperience with various dynamic & static languages.Groovy, Python, Bash, TypeScript, C#Collaborating with our dedicated ops team, client developers and other backend developers in various locationsAndroid & iOS app integration and delivery   Bonus points   Unity Game development knowledge.Asset Caching integration & strategiesClient development experience.Familiarity with web protocols, application servers and web servers.Knowledge about modern deterministic build systems such as Google Bazel   A great saga needs all sorts of heroes   Making games is fun.Especially when you do it with people who share the same idea of what makes a good workplace, great.We design games for everyone, no matter where they are or who they are, and we employ all sorts of people from all kinds of backgrounds to bring them to life.Truth is, we simply can’t expect diversity in our players and originality in our games without first nurturing it in our people.A great saga needs all sorts of heroes.And that’s it.   King in Stockholm   The location of our first studio and the birthplace of Candy Crush Saga, Stockholm - with all its urban delights and open spaces - holds a special place in our hearts.Built over 14 islands, it’s one of the world’s most unique and beautiful capital cities.With King based right in the centre, it’ll yours to enjoy and explore.   Comprehensive relocation package   People come from all over the world to work with us, and we want every single one of them to feel at home.To do so, we help you out as much as we can with our relocation package.This includes full visa sponsorship for you and any family member moving with you, covering your journey out here, the cost of shipping your gadgets or helping you with estate agents.See more about our relocation process at: https://jobs.king.com/benefits#relocation   Apply now!   Want to join our Kingdom?You’ll find all you need to apply, plus more information on our culture, values and benefits, including relocation packages at jobs.king.com.All applications should be made in English.

headline: DevOps Software Engineer to Mycronic
description.text: As a prime driver in the electronics industry, our world-leading and unique production solutions impact the very future of technology.And our technology is everywhere.Inside jet motors travelling the globe.Inside people as pace makers continue to save lives.Right now, we are on a journey of growth, where we continue to explore new markets and expand worldwide.And on the road ahead, we need the right kind of people by our side.People, perhaps, much like you.   OM TJÄNSTEN   The goal is to bring products to market faster, deliver software and updates more frequent, and make the entire process robust and reliable.   Our new team member will balance a number of different tasks including coding, integration and testing.   As a person, you are a problem solver with analytical skills and constantly seek integration points to gain a smoother overall workflow.   You will be part of a team designing platform software for component based delivery.   Main challenge is to provide scalable and robust testing environments as well as production deployment infrastructure that are configurable and standardized at various levels.   You will collaborate closely with colleagues, development teams and partners globally and internally at our office in Täby.   ARBETSUPPGIFTER   * Drive software automation and configuration according to our vision   * Design, build and operate the DevOps technology stack   * Identify release process shortcomings and plan for re-engineering   * Configuration and automation management   * Design and build health checks, single point of failure and notifications   * Ensuring operational best practices by working closely with the deployment/releasing teams   * Establish and communicate software automation roadmaps   VI SÖKER DIG SOM   * Degree in Computer Science or similar   * Some years of experience from professional software development   * Experience from a DevOps position   * Strong communication skills in spoken and written English   * Excellent automation skills (tool agnostic) on both Linux and Windows   * Understanding the software development lifecycle   * Knowledge and interests in python, Docker, Jenkins, Artifactory and Kubernetes is a plus   * Effective cross-functional leadership skills   You are a senior developer, software configuration manager or a sysadmin who wants to deepen your automation and configuration knowledge along with a broader system understanding.   You have the ability to identify release process shortcomings and drive the improvement in collaboration with the respective teams.   As a person you are:   * Results-oriented   * Build relationships   * Structured   * Solutions-oriented   OTHER INFORMATION   * Start: Upon agreement   * Work extent: Fulltime   * Location: Täby   * This recruitment process is conducted by Academic Work.Kindly direct all your questions to us.      Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the screening or interview phase.   INFORMATION OM FÖRETAGET   Mycronic is a Swedish high-tech company with more than 1200 people engaged in the development, manufacturing and marketing of production equipment.We offer you the chance to join a profitable and growing company with an open work culture and knowledgeable colleagues.Colleagues who learn and share expertise with each other to drive innovation and increase customer value.With all our different perspectives, backgrounds and expertise we keep making the impossible possible.Again and again.And it is our three core values–passion for business, passion for technology and passion for people–that guides, drives and unites us, all over the globe.Find out more about Mycronic and what it’s like to work with us at mycronic.com/career.

headline: Devops Engineer / Energy sector
description.text: About the job   We at AFRY (former ÅF and Pöyry) are now searching for a consultant with the profile DevOps Engineer (Trainee) for one of our customers.   In this assignment you are hired on a full-time project basis at AFRY, with the possibility to go into an employment with our customer after 9 months.   About the customer   St1 is a Nordic energy company with the vision of becoming the leading producer and seller of CO2-aware energy.St1 has among others bioethanol plants, a refinery in Gothenburg Sweden, wind turbines in Finland as well as service stations in Finland, Sweden and Norway.   The cornerstone in the business is the sale of fuels for transport and heating use to consumers and the corporate sector.There is also the St1 and Shell service station networks, the latter under a license agreement.   The strong performance in the traditional fossile fuel business enables St1 to invest in sustainable energy solutions and to build a solid foundation for realizing the vision through renewable energy.St1 are already recycling waste for fuel and using wind power to produce electricity.In the spirit of the vision, each of St1’s solutions must be technically and economically feasible and ecologically sustainable – today.   Your main tasks together with the team are to      Take an automation engineer role in the St1 infrastructure team   Be a part of the team who ensures that automation, metrics, logs, etc.are further developed   Become an automation expert having focus on automation & orchestration of tools   Make sure that automation, monitoring and all associated processes are providing the best possible feedback to all stakeholders   Be part of Developing, update business continuity and disaster recovery protocols   Share information and provide technical advice to colleagues   Develop tools for application developers and help them with DevOps related work         Who are you?   You are passionate about Cloud/Hybrid IT and its associated technologies including Azure and Google cloud platforms with emphasis on infrastructure and automation.You have an “Automate everything”-attitude and ability to quickly learn, understand, and work with emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions.You will be part of the team making sure that cloud infrastructure is well designed, and all automation is in place.Therefore, you need to have an interest and/or experience in agile software development and teamwork.We encourage you to be curious and take initiatives to get to know your team and how you and the team can deliver together.   You need to have      Computer Science, software engineer or related degree or certification   Understanding of Cloud/Hybrid IT and its associated technologies including Azure and Google cloud platforms   Knowledge of software development methodologies such as continuous integration, continuous delivery   Knowledge of DevOps tools – Bamboo/Jenkins, Git/bitbucket, Jira, Terraform, Ansible, etc.   Able to script with at least one programming language (Python, Perl, Ruby, etc.)   Understanding of Database, Networking and AD   Very good verbal and written communication skills in English and Swedish   Finnish or Norwegian is considered an advantage         We offer   The AFRY Group is ranked as one of Sweden’s most popular employer among engineers.At AFRY you will be involved in developing innovative and sustainable solutions within infrastructure, energy and industry.We are always looking for the sharpest skills that can create a future society together with us.We hope you will learn as much from us as we will learn from you.   This assignment will offer you      An interesting position in a reputable, growing and innovative Nordic company   Nordic team with great spirit   Good chances to influence your own work structure   Ongoing training and development possibilities      If you are enthusiastic about the potential of technology, new learning and to be part of building a sustainable future - you may be the new colleague we are looking for.   You will work from the office in Sundbyberg (Stockholm) and occasionally travel to other Nordic countries.      About the company   AFRY is an international engineering, design and advisory company.We support our clients to progress in sustainability and digitalisation.      We are 17,000 devoted experts within the fields of infrastructure, industry and energy, operating across the world to create sustainable solutions for future generations.      Making Future

headline: Utvecklare inom DevOps till Tieto
description.text: Här får du möjlighet att utvecklas hos en arbetsgivare som ligger i framkant inom branschen.Tieto i Sundsvall söker nu dig som vill arbeta som utvecklare mot DevOps.   Har du erfarenheter av Linux och vill ta nästa kliv i IT-branschen?I den här tjänsten får du arbeta med nya verktyg och metoder som ligger i framkant!Sök tjänsten redan idag då urval och intervjuer sker löpande. Professionals Nord har stark lokal kännedom och tillsammans med oss blir du en viktig representant som bidrar till ett starkare Norrland!   Arbetsuppgifter   Tieto i Sundsvall har i dagsläget större projekt där du kommer arbeta i team med att automatiskera och orkestrera för flertal kunder.Tieto arbetar agilt i små team och följer ITIL i leveranser och driftåtagande.   I den här tjänsten som back-end utvecklare har du stora utvecklingsmöjligheter där du kommer att få lära dig av erfarna och duktiga kollegor.Vidare erbjuder Tieto en arbetsplats som ligger i framkant inom moderna arbetsmetoder och utveckling.   Vi söker dig som   •	Har ett brinnande intresse för back-end, ( HW, OS, Nät och Middleware).   •	God kompetens av operativsystemen Linux och/eller Windows.   •	Erfarenhet av DevOps-verktyg   •	Meriterande att du har erfarenheter av konfiguration och skriptning.   Antingen ser vi att du inhämtat dina erfarenheter genom utbildning eller arbetslivet.Tjänsten kommer att anpassas efter dina tidigare erfarenheter och hos Tieto finns många duktiga kollegor att ta lärdom av.   Vi tror att dina personliga egenskaper är avgörande för hur väl du kommer trivas i rollen hos Tieto.   Du är serviceinriktad och har intresset av att ha kundkontakt dagligen.Vidare är du engagerad och har ett driv av att lära dig branschen.   START: Omgående, enligt överenskommelse   OMFATTNING: Heltid   STAD: Sundsvall   URVAL: Sker löpande      Sök tjänsten genom att klicka på ”sök jobbet” nedan.Vi går igenom urvalet löpande och kan därför ha gått vidare med kandidater innan annonsen stängs ner.Om du vill kan du även skapa en användare och ladda upp ditt CV och personliga brev.   Information om kundföretaget   Tietos mål är att vara kundernas förstahandsval för affärsförnyelse och det ledande mjukvaru- och tjänsteföretaget i Norden.   I en snabbt föränderlig värld kan varje bit av information användas för att skapa nytt värde.Tieto vill omsätta möjligheterna i den datadrivna världen till värde för människor, företag och samhället i stort.Vi har idag en framträdande roll i det digitala ekosystemet och använder vår mjukvara och våra tjänster för att skapa verktyg och lösningar som förenklar vardagen för miljontals människor, hjälper kunder att förnya sin affär genom att fånga möjligheterna med modernisering, digitalisering och innovation och som skapar nya möjligheter baserat på öppenhet, innovationssamarbeten och ekosystem.   Om oss   Vi vet av erfarenhet att du som medarbetare är den viktigaste resursen för företagen.Därför arbetar vi med kvalité och personlig matchning till alla våra tjänster för att hitta rätt jobb för dig.Vi satsar på att skapa och bibehålla arbetstillfällen i Norrland genom personaluthyrning och rekrytering.Hos Professionals Nord finns en gedigen branscherfarenhet och en gemensam vision – För ett starkare Norrland!Läs mer om oss på www.professionalsnord.se.

headline: Cloud Architect & DevOps Engineer
description.text: mySafety Försäkringar has for 20 years challenged the insurance market with innovative insurances for everyday problems and quality of life crimes.We are the market leader in ID protection insurances and other services that provide safety and simplify daily life.Through our partners and our own channels, we offer insurances for consumers and companies in the Nordics.mySafety is there for you every day, around the clock.      mySafety is looking for a Cloud Architect & DevOps Engineer         We are looking for a person who thrives in a high paced environment and is eager to learn and adapt to new technologies.As part of a highly skilled Ops team, you will have cloud, cloud security and DevOps tools as a top priority, you know your way around Azure services and love to automate away dull tasks.            Your main focus will be our cloud architecture on a global scale, which is, and will be the cornerstone of our business systems.You will make sure that our services are up and running day and night, stay secure and as automated as possible.      We are embarking on an exciting journey, where we are working on improving and further developing our IT platforms and systems to ‘best in class’ solutions.            Desired Skills       Communication skills with IT, developers, business stakeholders, vendors, across borders       Microsoft AD / Azure AD       Container services, such as Docker, Kubernetes, Rancher or similar       Scripting language, preferably Powershell       Azure platform (APIM, PowerApps, Flow)       Database skills (MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL)       Understanding of development methodologies and tools       Microsoft server and clients       Linux system knowledge is an advantage       Telecom/VoIP/WebRTC is an advantage       Network monitoring and troubleshooting (e.g.pcap/wireshark) is an advantage       Experience from Microsoft Business applications is an advantage      We think your English is excellent, both written and oral.It’s a big plus if you can speak Swedish, but not a must, since all our systems and documentation is in English.            You will report to mySafetys CTO.   This position is based in Stockholm, at our office in Gärdet.            Our promise to you      We can offer you a dynamic workplace, certified by Great Place to Work.The tempo is high, and we enable growth, both for you as an individual as well as for teams and the company as a whole.Our believe is that employees who are engaged and enjoy being at mySafety, performs great.Therefore, the company culture is on top of our agenda and together we enable success!            Application   Interested?Send in an application today!Last date for application is December 17th 2019.We will hold interviews continuously and the position may be appointed before the last application date.

salary_type.label: FAST_LON
duration.label: TILLSVIDARE
working_hours_type.label: HELTID

headline: Senior DevOps Engineer, IKEA IT
description.text: DevOps Engineering   Why we will love you We at Ingka Group believe you share the IKEA values and that you are passionate about our vision in becoming the world’s leading multichannel home furnishing retailer.We believe you have a great understanding of what simplicity and togetherness means.As a person you have the curiosity and clear understanding of how we would like to automate as well as integrate our deployment pipeline with a “getting things done” mentality.Together we will research, evaluate, develop and deploy new applications and work on ways to quickly identify and overcome any blockers we might encounter along the way.You are driven by renewing and improving by continuously integrating and delivering in a fast-paced and challenging environment.We believe you are experienced in: Public clouds like GCP and AzureDocker, Kubernetes, virtual machines and Linux Scripting in Bash, Python or Groovy and coding in Java, C#, Javascript or GoInfrastructure automation A day in your life with us We trust your knowledge and experience when it comes to DevOps ways of working, that’s why you will have the space to take responsibility for the tools and methods we use for our continuous delivery.We guide, advice and consult teams towards a modern, efficient & safe agile delivery model.When you spot an opportunity to innovate, we at IKEA encourage you to do so.Feel free to test new solutions, creative suggestions or bringing aboard new technologies to boost the everyday life for all our co-workers and customers.And by working closely with your fellow engineers.In our chapter we share our knowledge and coach each other when it comes to functional expertise.We will grow together towards a data-driven organisation by connecting across multiple initiatives within the Ingka Group.Together as a team We’re the ones who make it possible for people to have a smarter life at home and a hassle-free and rewarding shopping experience.Together we work to find new digital solutions for every business need to help make IKEA a great and efficient place to work.We like to think of ourselves as innovative and modern, and we believe that nothing would actually work without us.As personal and professional growth is important, we encourage curiosity.Together we will discover new things, step into the unknown and make sure we are always trying out new ways. QUESTIONS AND SUPPORT?LET'S CONNECT!You might have some questions about the position of DevOps Engineer or the recruitment process and that's a good thing!We are looking forward to receiving your application, but no later than the 31st of March.As we will have interviews on a continuous basis the position might be closed sooner.

headline: DevOps Engineer - Private Cloud
description.text: Telia IT is now looking for a new star to deliver Container-as-a-Service for Telia Company.Together with the team you build, develop and run the machinery of your domain.You will be part of Private Cloud, a team that provides Private IT Cloud capabilities for Telia Company.We build, run highly virtualized environments and develop as-a-Service offerings for our users.As part of the team you will be challenged to keep pace at scale, work with a mixed set of technologies and continuously improve our delivery to keep users happy.Right now, we are developing Container-as-a-Service and are looking for you who are skilled in Kubernetes to join us.Coding, scripting skills as well as experience from working with Kubernetes is key for this position.Knowing your way around VMware is considered a bonus.WHO ARE YOU?We think you have a forward leaning mindset and are passionate about technology, at work you are likely not afraid of challenging status quo and like trying new things.You constantly look for improvements and like exploring ideas and experimenting together with your colleagues. This role requires an open mindset, strong collaboration skills and willingness to continuously make new mistakes to learn and grow.Must-haves:Experience implementing and working with KubernetesCoding, scripting skills of a modern language (e.g.Golang, Python, C#, PowerShell)Forward thinking and open mindsetUnderstanding of agile principles.Nice-to-haves:Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) experienceVMware (vSphere / vRA / vRO) experienceEnglish proficiency, written and oral as well as effective communication skills are expected.INTERESTED?Fancy joining my team?Apply for the job!Do you want to know more, connect with me on LinkedIn.Last day to apply is October 14th, 2019.WELCOME TO TELIA – HOME TO YOUR NEXT BIG OPPORTUNITY!

Chas är ett företag som verkligen satsar på CSR-arbete, vi tror på att göra mer än att bara donera pengar.Vi har haft projekt där flera av våra konsulter åkt ner till Laos för att bygga upp en mikroekonomi mitt ute i djungeln.Vi har hållit utvecklingskurser i socialt utsatta områden och delat ut mat till hemlösa.Vill du också vara med och påverka samhället och kanske har ett eget CSR-projekt du brinner för?Då vill vi prata mer med dig! Självklart är du en lagspelare som lätt arbetar i team eller på egen hand om så krävs.   OM OSS   Chas har utsetts till Europas bästa arbetsgivare av European Business Awards som arrangerar Europas största företagstävling.Bland annat för vårt demokratiska arbetssätt med möjlighet till inflytande för medarbetarna samt vårt sätt att arbeta med förmåner och personlig karriärutveckling.Chas har också utsetts till Årets Entreprenör i Europa av European Business Awards för hur vi med det etablerade bolagets trygga stabilitet arbetar med driv, innovativt tänkande och entusiasm likt start up-företag.Resultatet är att vi bedriver ett omfattande CSR-arbete, har startat upp en YH-skola som utbildar nya fullstack-utvecklare och har ett produktbolag. headline: Junior DevOps Engineer till Skandia!
description.text: Vi söker nu dig som vill vara med och bidra till Skandias framtida IT, där du får vara en del av bolagets förändringsresa där utvecklingen inom IT står i fokus!Vi söker nu två DevOps Engineers till Team Los Traqueros inom Skandias Shared Function-avdelning.Har du en utvecklarbakgrund och nu vill växa in i en roll där du får vara bryggan mellan IT och verksamheten?Då är det dig vi söker till Skandia – sök redan idag då vi arbetar med löpande urval i denna rekryteringsprocess!   OM TJÄNSTEN   Vi söker nu för vår kund Skandias räkning två DevOps Engineers som ska ingå i Team Los Traqueros inom Shared Functions-avdelningen.Att teamet kallas Los Traqueros vilket betyder jänvägsarbetare är ingen slump eftersom teamet lägger rälsen och gör all utveckling inom IT-processerna möjlig för att leveransen ska kunna ligga i framkant.Du kommer ingå i ett team som tillsammans stöttar cirka 25 stycken agila team inom Skandias utvecklingsavdelning och ha en kritisk funktion när det kommer till releasehantering  av applikationer i test- och produktionsmiljöer.   Du erbjuds   * En kreativ och högpresterande arbetmiljö   * Stort stöd och kompetensutbyte i ett seniort team   * Utvecklingsmöjligheter inom ett bolag som utnämnts till en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare 2019.   Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuder vi stora möjligheter för dig att växa professionellt, bygga ditt nätverk och skapa värdefulla kontakter för framtiden.Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande.   ARBETSUPPGIFTER   I rollen kommer du tillsammans med teamet att automatisera och förenkla de flöden som Skandia arbetar med och sträva efter att hela tiden ligga i framkant.Du kommer att arbeta med allt från att utveckla verktyg, byggen i Azure DevOps Server och processer i Octopus Deploy, till att supportera teamens drift av deras applikationer.   Denna roll passar dig som brinner för verksamhetsnära IT och att få vara med och arbeta med framkantens teknik.Har du ett stort intresse för att utvecklas mot DevOps och CI/CD så är detta rätt möjlighet för dig!   VI SÖKER DIG SOM   * Har en relevant högskoleutbildning inom IT   * Har minst 1 års erfarenhet som .Net-utvecklare eller likvärdig arbetslivserfarenhet, alternativt har tidigare erfarenhet från arbete i en DevOps-roll   * Har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, då arbetsuppgifterna kräver det   Det är även meriterande om du har tidigare kunskap i/erfarenhet av: .NET Core, SQL Server, Splunk, IIS, MSMQ, GitVersion, ASP.NET, Azure DevOps Server, Octopus Deploy, SonarQube, NPM, NuGet, Docket eller Kubernetes.   Som person är du:   * Orädd, initiativtagande och självgående   * Strukturerad och noggrann   * Kommunikativ och har en god samarbetsförmåga   Under denna rekryteringsprocess lägger vi även stor vikt vid att du motiverar ditt intresse för rollen och Skandia som företag genom hela processen.   Övrig information   * Start: Omgående/Januari   * Omfattning: Heltid   * Placering: Kungsholmen   * Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work och Skandias önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten hanteras av Academic Work.   Vi går igenom urvalet löpande och annonsen kan stängas ner innan tjänsten är tillsatt om vi gått över till urvals- och intervjufasen.

duration.label: SEX_MANADER_ELLER_LANGRE
working_hours_type.label: HELTID
employer.name: Academic Work Sweden AB

headline: DevOps tekniker till Data Ductus
description.text: Data Ductus är ett modernt, flexibelt företag som erbjuder högkvalitativa IT-tjänster för stora och medelstora företag och organisationer.Vi arbetar nära våra kunder och bygger långsiktiga relationer där våra tjänsteområden är affärsutveckling, systemutveckling, systemintegration samt drift, förvaltning & support.På vårt kontor i Uppsala är vi närmare 80 medarbetare.   Mer information om Data Ductus gå in på  (http://www.dataductus.com) www.dataductus.com (http://www.dataductus.com)      Vi söker dig som   Har ett brinnande intresse och erfarenhet inom Linux och molntjänster.Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med olika Linux-dialekter och gillar att skriva script för att förenkla vardagen.Vi tror att du är van att hantera Docker-containers och närliggande tekniker som t ex lastbalansering.      Vi är intresserade av dig med lång erfarenhet, men även dig som är i början av din karriär.Du bör dock ha ett par års erfarenhet för att vara kvalificerad för tjänsten.      Uppdraget erbjuder dig   Du kommer att arbeta i en öppen och prestigelös organisation, med bra gemenskap och utan hierarkier.Samarbete, kommunikation och snabb feedback är ledord som är väl förankrade och genomsyrar hela organisationen.      Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig utveckling och inte minst på våra medarbetares kompetens.Vi erbjuder löpande kompetensutveckling med stora möjligheter att påverka den själv.   Vi vill förstås känna att vi har roligt på jobbet, och desto viktigare är det också att vi kan erbjuda en bra balans mellan arbetsliv och privatliv.För oss är gemenskap och sammanhållning viktigt och därför arrangerar vi sociala aktiviteter.   Din arbetsplats kommer att vara i centrala Uppsala där du oftast arbetar inhouse tillsammans med kollegor som besitter djup teknisk kompetens.Data Ductus strävar efter att ligga i teknikens framkant för att kunna möta och överträffa kundernas förväntningar.Du har stor möjlighet att själv påverka i vilka projekt du arbetar dels utifrån intresse samt att du ska få möjlighet att fortsätta utvecklas i den riktning du önskar.      Du har goda kunskaper inom följande områden:    Linux    Shell script    Webbservrar (Apache, Nginx)    Automationsverktyg (t ex Ansible, Saltstack eller Puppet)    Övervakning    Serverinfrastruktur      Utöver detta ser vi gärna att du har andra erfarenheter och kompetensområden.Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av molntekniker och tjänster från t ex Google, Amazon eller Microsoft.      Meriterande kunskapsområden inom scriptning: Python, Bash, .Net/C# samt nedan:       Lagring    Nätverk    Docker/Kubernetes    SQL/NoSQL    Deployment    Microsoft Server    MS SQL      Du bör behärska svenska och engelska väl och ha en förmåga att dokumentera på ett tydligt sätt.      Personliga egenskaper   Vi ser gärna att du besitter kunskap och erfarenhet som ger dig möjlighet att se helheten i en IT-driftleverans.Förutom kunskap inom specifika områden (se kravlistan ovan) har du förmågan att se IT-leveranser utifrån ett helikopterperspektiv.Det är viktigt att du har ett grundligt driv i ditt arbete.Du behöver ha en framåtlutad inställning till din egen leverans.Din känsla för service är hög - Du hanterar både kunder och kollegor på ett inbjudande och förtroendeingivande sätt.Du trivs som lagspelare och arbetar gärna i team men kan även driva uppgifter och mindre projekt på egen hand.      Om din anställning   Ovanstående är ett konsultuppdrag där du erbjuds tillsvidareanställning hos SJR i Uppsala.Uppdraget startar så snart som möjligt och förväntas pågå löpande.Du har goda möjligheter att på sikt rekryteras direkt till Data Ductus.      Ansökan   Vi intervjuar löpande så ansök redan idag.      Tänk på att din ansökan inte ska innehålla uppgifter kring hälsa, medborgarskap, sexuell läggning eller medlemskap i fackförening.Notera även att vi tyvärr inte kan ta emot CV via e-post.För information om hur vi behandlar kandidaters personuppgifter se vår integritetspolicy: https://sjr.se/gdpr/integritet...      Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!      Konsult hos SJR   Att arbeta som konsult hos SJR innebär att du blir en del av en dedikerad organisation med kompetens att ge dig perfekta förutsättningar att utvecklas både inom din yrkesroll och på ett personligt plan.Du får tillgång till vårt stora nätverk av intressanta företag och uppdragsgivare och därmed en unik möjlighet att ta din karriär till nästa steg.Vi på SJR bryr oss om vår personal och tillsammans med oss får du en långsiktig partner som ger dig trygghet och stöd.Vi är lyhörda för dina behov och du kommer att ha en nära relation med din konsultchef som hjälper dig med dina utmaningar.      Om företaget   SJR in Sweden (SJR) är ett av Sveriges ledande och mest erfarna bolag inom rekrytering och konsultlösningar.Ända sedan starten 1993 har vi varit specialiserade inom såväl personlighetsbedömning som de områden vi rekryterar till, vilket ger oss en unik förmåga att utifrån högt ställda krav matcha rätt kompetens med rätt uppdragsgivare.Vi erbjuder specialistkompetens inom Finance, HR, Supply Chain och IT.SJR är idag cirka 550 medarbetare fördelade på tre regioner - Stockholm, Väst och Syd, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Helsingborg och Uppsala.Koncernen består av moderbolaget SJR in Scandinavia AB med dotterbolagen SJR in Sweden AB, Ogunsen AB, SJR IT AB och WES AB      Titel: DevOps tekniker till Data Ductus

headline: DevOps Engineer - New Games
description.text: DevOps Engineer - SGT   The Stockholm Game Technology (SGT) team supports the new games studio in our collaborative studio mission to create and launch the next billion dollar franchise.The team collaborates with game teams as well as shared tech teams in order to create and maintain the tech that enables the future of King's mobile game development.   Your role within our Kingdom   As our DevOps Engineer, you will be a part of a team with a mission to build and maintain technology to support the studio in creating our new franchises.This includes evaluating existing tech, developing new creative solutions for our build pipeline, investigating problems reported by the game teams and coaching our game teams.You will work in close collaboration with our game teams and enjoy a creative, challenging and collaborative workplace where your ideas will be every bit as valued as your DevOps expertise.   You will work in a dynamic environment where work is driven by the requirements of the game teams which might include adapting to studio portfolio changes.Therefore you should be a fast learner with a positive attitude and a strong passion for working with new technology.You're excited about doing what's best for the games and adaptable enough to work on different things day to day based on their needs.   Skills to create thrills   You have a great passion for DevOps engineering, new technologies, large scale systems and games.You’re an excellent communicator, happy dealing with people from different business units and with varying degrees of technical savviness.Therefore, you’re able to translate business needs to technical requirements and implementation.   Experience with the Unity build system   CI/CD build tools like JenkinsTask & build automation tools like GradleRepo systems like Artifactory, NPM, VerdaccioImproving team workflows via automation (Probot, Github and Slack integrations, notifications and alerts)The mindset of writing tests along with the application code of projects, building up a healthy test coverageExperience with SplunkExperience with Kubernetes, Helm and DockerExperience with various dynamic & static languages.Groovy, Python, Bash, TypeScript, C#Collaborating with our dedicated ops team, client developers and other backend developers in various locationsAndroid & iOS app integration and delivery   Bonus points   Unity Game development knowledge.Asset Caching integration & strategiesClient development experience.Familiarity with web protocols, application servers and web servers.Knowledge about modern deterministic build systems such as Google Bazel   A great saga needs all sorts of heroes   Making games is fun.Especially when you do it with people who share the same idea of what makes a good workplace, great.We design games for everyone, no matter where they are or who they are, and we employ all sorts of people from all kinds of backgrounds to bring them to life.Truth is, we simply can’t expect diversity in our players and originality in our games without first nurturing it in our people.A great saga needs all sorts of heroes.And that’s it.   King in Stockholm   The location of our first studio and the birthplace of Candy Crush Saga, Stockholm - with all its urban delights and open spaces - holds a special place in our hearts.Built over 14 islands, it’s one of the world’s most unique and beautiful capital cities.With King based right in the centre, it’ll yours to enjoy and explore.   Comprehensive relocation package   People come from all over the world to work with us, and we want every single one of them to feel at home.To do so, we help you out as much as we can with our relocation package.This includes full visa sponsorship for you and any family member moving with you, covering your journey out here, the cost of shipping your gadgets or helping you with estate agents.See more about our relocation process at: https://jobs.king.com/benefits#relocation   Apply now!   Want to join our Kingdom?You’ll find all you need to apply, plus more information on our culture, values and benefits, including relocation packages at jobs.king.com.All applications should be made in English.
