headline: DevOps engineer to Container Platform Team
description.text:
Group IT's role in Swedbank is to provide the bank with a stable IT operation that is up and running 24 hours per day. Together with Business Areas and Group functions we transform Swedbank into a modern bank both in terms of digitalization as well as way of working. Group IT provides services that are reliable and secure, and that meet customer expectations. We are approximately 600 employees located in Stockholm, Tallinn, Vilnius and Riga.

Swedbank is the bank for the many. We believe in a diverse and inclusive work place, and we want all our employees to feel valuable and have the prerequisites to perform at their very best. Inspiring and learning from each other is what move us forward. Join us in our journey and find out more about us at: swedbank.com/work-with-us

About the job We are creating a new Hybrid Container platform with the NoOps mindset. Automation will be everywhere and "* as Code" is the motto. We work in the DevOps way and are leading the transformation journey in New Ways of Working. You will be involved in everything around the platform, from daily operations to development and innovation. You will have great possibilities to develop with modern technologies, as it is crucial that we keep up with in this area. On paper we are a small team, but we have such good collaboration with developers and the business that it feels like a big family. There is a great team spirit in the team and we are looking for you that fits in to that, because we love to have fun at work!

Why work with me? We are a very driven and engaged team with the new DevOps mindset. We don´t like to look backwards, we look forwards...

Teamwork for me as a manager is the key to success. My focus will be on creating a great team spirit and give the team members the best possibilities to do what they do best.

I have an available and supportive leadership style and have an open mindset. For me it is important to have a work environment where you feel important, have the possibilities to grow as a person and in the same time have fun.

If you are a driven person and find it motivating to be in an environment where you are given a lot of responsibility, where you will find lots of challenges and where there will be hard work but also where success is celebrated and shared with others, then this is the place for you.

So, join us and be a part of this exciting journey. 

What you need to succeed We are looking for people with the passion to make a change and are driven with an optimistic mindset.

We believe you should be open-minded with great interpersonal skills that loves new opportunities. Have a strong DevOps mindset and are able to inspire others and willing to take the first steps. We will work with cutting edge technology, so you need to be curious and wanting to learn new things.

We think that you:


Understand the power of infrastructure management tools (like Terraform, CloudForms, Puppet, Ansible etc.)
Have a "* as code" mindset and skills to back that up
Want to do security in the new way


What you may have worked with previously DevOps Architect/engineer

Software/infrastructure engineer
Potential next steps in your career after this job Agile Product owner
Domain Architect
Leadership
At Swedbank we have a lot of exciting opportunities, you lead yourself to find experiences that inspire you – We stand behind you and support you.
We may begin the selection under the application period, so we welcome your application as soon as possible.
Nothing of interest for you – recommend the job to a friend!

We have made our choice regarding recruitment media and therefore kindly decline contact with ad sellers or sellers of other recruitment services.

headline: AWS DevOps Expert to Cybercom Gothenburg
description.text:
Don’t waste any more time, keep reading!


Here at Cybercom we are proud to say that we have been qualified and approved for the AWS MSP Partner program and a DevOps Competence Partner! This means that we are skilled at cloud infrastructure and application migration, and deliver value to customers by offering proactive monitoring, automation, and management of our customer’s environment. Now we are searching for someone who wants to join our AWS team in Gothenburg and take on the role as AWS DevOps Expert!

As AWS DevOps Expert at Cybercom your work
will include:

     Define and deliver on-site technical engagements with customers.

     Help customers with understanding the benefits of DevOps with AWS.

     Guide customer on organizational level to understand and adapt to DevOps.

     Innovate on new ways for our customers to be even more cloud native with a DevOps focus.

     Automate everything!

     Advise customers on their current DevOps setups.

     Architect solutions on AWS.

     Share knowledge to the rest of our AWS team and contribute to great team spirit!




We see you have experience in AWS 3+ years and 5+ years of working with DevOps. You have expertise within things like automation, infrastructure as code, development best practices and CI/CD. You have also worked with architecting and implementing solutions on top of AWS. You must be fluent in English, both written and verbally. Swedish is also a welcome bonus.

AWS certifications are meritorious, certifications ranked in a descending order for this job:

1. AWS Certified DevOps Engineer - Professional

2. AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional

3. AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate

4. Other AWS Certs

Who are we?


Cybercom is an IT consulting company enabling companies and organizations to benefit from the opportunities of the connected world and to enhance their competitiveness. We’ve been an AWS partner since 2012, which gives us a strong foundation to design, build, migrate and operate many different workloads on AWS. We have a strategic collaboration with Amazon Web Services to help companies and organizations accelerate their journey to the cloud and boost their digital transformation.

Does this sound interesting? Please apply through our website.

headline: DevOps for Glooko Diabetes Data Management
description.text:
Want to join a fast-paced company with a mission to improve the life of people living with diabetes?

https://youtu.be/PrcAv-gcWmA

We´re looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our skilled team! Our Engineering team works with a broad span of techniques, from embedded linux systems to databases and applications for web, desktop and mobile. We always strive to be better, we love to make improvements and will appreciate your input in the work we do!

This is what you’ll do…

Manage and evolve production and development environments including planning for size, capacity and performance.Implement security best practices to ensure compliance and adherence to standards.Plan and build a deployment framework/workflow to enable efficient release of products into production.Proactively monitor the environment to ensure that Glooko’s products meets operations related requirements and SLAsWork together with a global team to help improve the life of people living with diabetes!

This is the job for you, if you…

Have 3+ years of working experience in a DevOps role or related field.Experience with AWS platform.Experience with Linux, MySQL and scripting.Knowledge of container and orchestration technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)Hands-on experience with Protocols, Load Balancers and VPN.

If you already have knowledge or interest in health and diabetes, that is an advantage – but it is not required. Submit your application now if you want to help simplify life for everyone with a connection to diabetes!

In case you’re wondering, Glooko offers…

A very stimulating international challenge in an established, stable international company. We are looking for someone who wants to be a part of our organization for the future with great influence and great responsibility.


Glooko’s diasend® is a market leading product that simplifies life with diabetes by optimizing diabetes data management. Our comprehensive solution involves uploading, storing and analyzing data from a clear majority of the diabetes devices currently available on the global market – allowing patients and caregivers to easily access, understand and share the same information. This equals highly valued support for people living with diabetes during, as well as in-between, clinic visits and makes the work of diabetes-coaches around the world much more efficient and accurate.

headline: Manager  - CAD DevOps & TDM Development
description.text: Scania is currently undergoing an exciting transformation from a traditional truck manufacturer to a provider of complete sustainable transport solutions.IT is a crucial part of this transformation as Scania’s success is depending on flexible and efficient IT solutions that support current and future business requirements.   Development IT   Servant leadership is what we believe will lead our teams to success.A servant leader at Scania IT directs and motivates through why and what, lets goals be set by individuals and teams and involves everyone in decision making.A servant leader sets up business objectives and key results based on prototyping and experimentation and interacts face to face.Transparency is promoted and information is made available.Ideas are embraced and the people are loved.   Is this your mindset and your natural way of working as a leader?Then you might be the one we are looking for!   At Product Development IT (PD IT), we are responsible for the design, development, implementation and maintenance of IT solutions where our main users are Reseach & Development.Our responsibility is Scania’s CAD/vPDM platform including CATIA, Enovia and Delmia.We are also in the beginning of an exciting journey, going from V5 to the new platform 3DExperience.This will affect 12 000 users worldwide and is a key to success for future product development at Scania.   The work environment is international and our employees are representing different nationalities and countries.To this exciting and dynamic environment we are now looking for a servant leader who can influence the future IT landscape within the organization.   Your responsibilities   As a Manager of CAD DevOps and TDM Development your tasks typically are:   Motivating, engaging and developing your co-workers.   Create prerequisites for improvement/development within the specific area of DevOps and TDM development (PLM), both in the current platform and the future platform.   Create a common strategy together with your colleagues in both IT and business, communicate it and make sure that your teams are executing it in the right direction.   Lead cross-functional assignments and create value streams with an agile mindset, and enable the teams to deliver value to our end users faster.   Your profile   You are a humble, engaged and experienced leader with a passion to develop people and organizations.You strive for growing as a person together with your teams and you understand and believe in a modern organization and culture where you value people and their possibilities.   You involve your employees when creating business plans with focus and energy.You have the courage to test new ideas and have them tried in short iterations.You continuously change based upon the outcome and you see creativity and enthusiasm as a great way of working.   Building great agile development teams and working in a network organization is a given for you.   You probably have an IT education at university level and/or equivalent experience which has given you the ability to talk in terms of IT matters and understanding the reality of the users.You have a natural understanding of our mission to support the business with superior IT solutions.   A PLM and/or engineering background would also be of great interest.   You continuously work to learn and increase your own knowledge.You understand that knowledge is crucial for our business and you create a climate where the employees can increase and nourish their knowledge.   We offer   We offer you an interesting, fun, challenging and developing journey together with both engaged colleagues in the teams within the group and in the CAD/vPDM management team.   In addition to career and development opportunities, we can also offer Scania employees other benefits, such as a company car, performance bonuses, a pension, flexible working hours, lunch at reduced prices and much more.If you live in Stockholm, we offer a direct bus service between Stockholm and Södertälje, the Scania Job Express.   Additional information   We will be out of the office for Christmas and New Year, but back and available for questions from the 7th of January.   Application   Your application includes a CV and cover letter.We handle applications ongoing from the 7th of January.   Scania is a part of Traton Group and one of the world´s leading manufacturers of trucks and buses for heavy transport applications.Scania is also leading provider of industrial and marine engines.Service-related products account for a growing proportion of the company´s operations, assuring Scania customers of cost-effective transport solutions and maximum uptime.Scania also offers financial services.   Scania’s IT organisation is an integrated part of the company providing products and services to all business units worldwide.Based on deep Scania business knowledge and internal relations we balance in-house core competences and service production with services externally sourced and governed by us.We are around 1500 people and the majority is located in Sodertalje.

headline: Container Platform Engineer för CI/CD DevOps, Solna
description.text: Arbetsförmedlingen är Sveriges största förmedlare av arbeten.Varje år sammanför vi på olika sätt tusentals arbetssökande med arbetsgivare som behöver nya medarbetare.Vi har den samlade kunskapen om arbetsmarknaden, branscher och yrken.Som medarbetare hos oss får du, tillsammans med våra ca 12 000 kreativa och professionella medarbetare, vara med och bidra till att öka sysselsättningen och en välfungerande arbetsmarknad.   Är du intresserad av Container-teknik och är du en social person som inspireras av nya utmaningar och innovationer?Då har vi den perfekta positionen för dig!   Som Container Platform Engineer (CPE) arbetar du med CI/CD och DevOps nära tekniken.   Din kompetens kommer att utmanas vid utformning, tillgängliggörande och implementering av förbättrade lösningar för alla Arbetsförmedlingens utvecklingsteam.Du kommer att arbeta med tekniker som Openshift, Linux, och Bitbucket.Vår roll är att tillhandahålla den Container-platform som alla team använder sig av.   Du har lätt för att arbeta självständigt och är en utpräglad lagspelare med hög motivation.Du är innovativ, kundfokuserad och lösningsorienterad samt naturligt nyfiken på området som gör att du är van att följa trender inom DevOps.   Du kommer att samverka med de flesta av våra team och vara navet för deras DevOps och kommer fullt få utnyttja hela din kompetens.Huvuddelen av vår miljö innefattar Groovy, Jenkins, RHEL, Docker och OpenShift.För att lyckas i denna roll tror vi att du är lika mycket tekniker som människo-människa.   CI/CD DevOps-teamet du kommer att ingå i tillhör Arbetsförmedlingens avdelning Data Science och Digitala Plattformar.      Vad du ska göra som en CPE    - Du kommer att managera vår OCP (Openshift Container Platform) PaaS/CaaS-tjänst, såväl som att bygga och underhålla dokumenterade produktions- och förproduktionsmiljöer i vårt OnPrem-moln    - Äga design, bygga, övervaka och expandera plattformen för att hjälpa till att leverera en fullt utrustad och säker plattform    - Bygga och underhålla övervakning och loggning av miljön    - I nära samarbete med utvecklingsteam aktivt stödja dem i deras användning av plattformen, inklusive definition av standarder, best praxis och naturligtvis on-boarding och felsökning    - Utveckla och managera OCP-specifika gemensamma applikationer (controllers) som gör plattformen smartare      Vi letar efter en-två personer med kompetens och erfarenhet i    - Användning av Openshift 3.x och container runtimes (Docker) (minst 2 år)    - Arbetat med DevOps nära utvecklingsteam (minst 2 år)    - Arbetat med automatiseringsverktyg (till exempel Puppet eller Ansible)    - Linux internals och shell programmering    - Erfarenhet i nätverksarkitektur (Cisco/ACI)    - Relevant högskoleutbildning och/eller flerårig erfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter    - Goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift är ett måste för tjänsten    Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet för rollen.   Övrigt   Anställningsformen är tillsvidare med tillträde enligt överenskommelse.Alla våra tjänster startar med en provanställning.Placeringsort Stockholm på nya huvudkontoret i Solna strand, Elektrogatan 4.   Ansökan   Ansök med CV och personligt brev, på svenska, i vårt rekryteringssystem.Betygskopior och liknande tas med till en eventuell intervju.   Kontaktperson:                  Vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en myndighet fri från diskriminering.Det är viktigt för oss att all kompetens tas tillvara och vi välkomnar alla sökande.Vi ser positivt på om du har kunskaper i något av våra nationella minoritetsspråk.

headline: ALTEN IS LOOKING FOR SENIOR DEVOPS ENGINEERS
description.text: ALTEN Stockholm is growing rapidly within our IT division.For our consultants it means that you will have opportunities to grow with us and also to influence in what directions we are expanding.Your development is our most important focus.      Personal qualities that we value are the ability to act professionally as a consultant and to understand the client’s goals and values.These include; someone who is positive, creative, outgoing and driven, able to create and maintain long lasting relationships with our customers, thrilled by problem solving and able to use creativity and hard work to find new solutions.We are looking for a senior DevOps Engineer - someone with AzureDevOps competence and knowledge.      We believe the suitable candidate would have the following:      • At least 3 years of relevant experience from Dev Ops / Fullstack development    • A strong passion for working with technology and a desire to learn and improve your knowledge    • A technical education at university or college level, or equivalent work experience    • Experience in debugging performance problems in a production environment    • Experience in reading, understand and analyzing server logs    • Experience in building scalable systems    • Experience in some of the techniques we use (see below)    • Passion for software development, scalable architecture and product building    • Care about code quality, testing and automation    • A sense of humor, and humility       It is great if you have experience with:    • Automation, configuration management, CI/CD, monitoring    • Working with distributed systems    • Building modern high performing web-services    • Hosting on Azure or a similar cloud platform    • Using Azure DevOps products    • Debugging [software name] performance bottlenecks    • Database modeling and performance analysis    • Network design or troubleshooting    • Configuration of Continuous Deployment solutions    • Metrics based alerting    • Containerization    • Container orchestration    • Building system integrations    • Kubernetes, Azure Function, Service Fabric    • build the CI/CD pipeline using mature tools such as Azure DevOps or Team City and Octopus    • Ensure Automation in both application level using (unite testing, Data Testing and Integration testing etc.),    • best practices in coding for all the development teams using multiple frameworks such as .Net core    • ensure that our software products are running smoothly, efficiently, and reliable in our environments and allow scalability when needed            Send an application if it sounds interesting!

headline: DevOps Engineer for Mullvad VPN // Gothenburg
description.text: We believe that privacy is fundamental to a well-functioning society where norms, ethics, and laws can safely be discussed and challenged.That same society cannot flourish and develop - nor can it exist - without privacy.This is why we provide a VPN service: because privacy is paramount, and apparently, not only to us.The  Mullvad VPN (https://mullvad.net/en/) community is fast growing, and so are we.Now, we have joined forces with Oddwork to search for an experienced DevOps Engineer to advance our back-end services.Perhaps you share our big life goal: to make internet censorship and mass surveillance ineffective.Welcome home then!      As a DevOps Engineer:   Welcome to a small, cohesive team working together to improve existing services as well as develop new ones.Here (and with your experience from), you will deploy, maintain, and manage our back-end services in a stack that is mainly written in Python and Go.      We are looking for you...    You’re driven by the cause and have a huge passion for transparency and security.You know that trust is a fragile thing: difficult to build, easy to lose.And now you want to blaze the trail with us and develop the most secure VPN service ever.Furthermore, you are comfortable using the right tools for the job and open to mastering new skills when necessary.      Our four requirements:      - You have run services on Linux-based systems before and know your way around a terminal   - You have experience with configuration management tools such as Ansible   - You have development experience   - You are fluent in English         Nice but not necessary:      - Experience with running services on bare-metal infrastructure   - Experience in developing services in Python or Go   - Experience with Docker and Kubernetes   - Familiar with Qubes OS         Why Mullvad VPN?   Privacy and freedom.As we breathe for the universal right to privacy, we also believe in having a life outside of work.That’s why we offer flexible working hours, 5000 SEK annually in allowances toward wellness-related activities, 25 days annual paid vacation, pension plan, and the possibility to work remotely.Moreover, we offer opportunities for growth along with company-initiated opportunities to attend various national and international conferences.In addition, we’ll pay for any reading material you feel contributes to your professional development.But what we really offer - how we say hi in the morning, how long it takes to brew a fresh pot of coffee, and what we think best accompanies sparkling wine - all these answers you’ll have to find out for yourself.And we can’t wait for you to make those discoveries!      So, where do we try to liberate the world from?From our new, fresh, crisp (call it what you want!)facilities in the absolute center of Gothenburg.      START: Right away   LOCATION: Gothenburg, Sweden   JOB HOURS: Full-time, permanent      APPLICATION CLOSING DATE: 2020-01-08      Mullvad VPN is a fast growing (+10% in October), value-based, profitable company with remote employees all over the world.68 % developers, 25 % operations/support and 6 % overhead.This is a permanent full-time position which we hope to fill as soon as possible, so don’t wait too long to apply.      We at  Oddwork (http://www.oddwork.se/) believe that the world would become a better place if everyone followed their dreams.That’s why we started our orange revolution - to empower talents and companies to Dare to Dream.As a recruitment and employer branding company, we challenge expectations and match talents with their next career adventure while helping organizations create stronger corporate cultures 7 days a week - 365 days a year.We know for sure that when the right personality and the right culture meet, magic happens!Curious and want to know more?Step into the world of Oddwork by  clicking here!(https://www.facebook.com/oddwork/)

headline: DevOps Engineers for our client in Malmö/Helsingborg
description.text: Are you a DevOps engineer who wants to work in Linux and with Cloud Based Technology?Then we want to get in touch with you!      About these recruitments      On behalf our client, who boasts one of Sweden's most well-known brands, we are now looking for DevOps engineers.Our client has made a promise: to carry out a major Digital Transformation Journey, to take them into the future.As a part of this journey, they want to build a new team of 50+ DevOps engineers.      This is where you come in!      Do you have a technical background that has given you knowledge within both system development and administration?Do you want to work in Linux, and with Cloud Based Technology?Would you describe yourself as a team player who is defined by simplicity, and tries to lead by example?      You will be hired directly by our client.All positions will be located in Malmö and Helsingborg, in the south of Sweden.The only language requirement however, is English (full verbal and written professional proficiency).      Experience and knowledge within some or all of the following areas will be viewed as greatly beneficial:       * Public clouds like GCP and Azure    * Kubernetes, containers and Linux    * Infrastructure automation using IaC    * CI/CD    * Scripting in Python, Groovy or Bash and coding in Kotlin, JavaScript or Go      We believe you have at a minimum three years' working experience.            Contact and application      Apply by clicking the application link.            Don't hesitate taking advantage of this opportunity!Get in touch with us and apply today, and we will tell you more.            We look forward to receiving your application!

headline: ALTEN VÄSTERÅS IS LOOKING FOR DEVOPS ARCHITECTS
description.text: ALTEN IT Västerås is now looking for a skilled Senior DevOps Engineer or DevOps Architect ready to take the next step in their career.For this long-term assignment, you will play a major role in developing ALTEN’s growth and partnership with one of our biggest clients´ within the Transportation Industry.You will be responsible for coaching a team of skilled Software -and DevOps engineers at ALTEN and have a close collaboration with stakeholders, ALTEN IT Business Unit and ALTEN’s Technical Unit Management Team.Emphasis will be placed on personal suitability, technical knowledge and analytical skills.      Your main responsibilities will include:      - Identifying business requirements of our client, negotiate and design interfaces together with external parties and stakeholders   - Set up of best practice processes and coaching the project teams   - Introduce Continuous Delivery into the teams   - Designing the entire DevOps environment from bottom to top (IoT/embedded – cloud) based on the client´s requirements   - Choosing the system architecture and each individual component of the chosen system   - SW test strategy, the enforcement of it and the creation and maintenance of test environments in which automated tests are executed   - Choosing the technologies for the implementation of each component and connections between the components   - Code review and controlling the architecture during iteration of system release   - Writing project documentation and its support      It is therefore required that you possess the following skills:      - Experience in DevOps in production environment   - Experience in CI/CD (Jenkins, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Spinnaker, Helm)   - Experience in interface design in SOA, loosely coupled architecture at the enterprise level   - Experience in designing Micro Services   - Experience in Cloud Deployment (AWS, Azure, GCP, Openstack)   - Experience in Enterprise busses / API GW   - Experience in Test Automation   - Experience in IoT Architecture and software stacks   - Good command of the English language   - Master’s degree in science      ABOUT ALTEN   ALTEN is a consulting company that develops and delivers expertise for world-leading companies with consultants in technology, IT and biochemistry.We are located in over 25 countries, have our headquarter in Paris and have more than 33 000 employees, of which 88 percent are engineers.In Sweden, we have over 1 700 employees and work from offices in twelve locations.Our clients are found in industries such as Automotive, Energy, Telecom, Industry, Aerospace & Defence and Life Science, where our consultants operate throughout the product development chain.   Welcome to read more about us at alten.se      WHAT WE OFFER YOU   Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN!We are driven by making people grow and develop, which is why we offer you the opportunity to work with what you are truly passionate about.At ALTEN, we have a broad range of assignments at most of the leading companies in Sweden in several different sectors, to make it possible for your wishes to come true.We offer both national and international opportunities and together with your coaching manager, you build your career path so you constantly are able to develop and achieve your goals and dreams!   As a consultant at ALTEN, you will get the genuine team feeling at your assignment but also a wonderful togetherness at ALTEN.All activities are of course optional.Work life balance is our top priority.We also have a collective agreement and other benefits like Pension, Insurances and Wellness grants.      We believe in growing together.            We look forward to receiving your application!

headline: Container Software Engineer för CI/CD DevOps, Solna
description.text: Arbetsförmedlingen är Sveriges största förmedlare av arbeten.Varje år sammanför vi på olika sätt tusentals arbetssökande med arbetsgivare som behöver nya medarbetare.Vi har den samlade kunskapen om arbetsmarknaden, branscher och yrken.Som medarbetare hos oss får du, tillsammans med våra ca 12 000 kreativa och professionella medarbetare, vara med och bidra till att öka sysselsättningen och en välfungerande arbetsmarknad.   I rollen som Container Software Engineer (CSE) är du en länk mellan infrastruktur och systemutveckling.   Du har insett vikten av CI/CD och lockas av de utmaningar som finns där.Ditt arbete kommer att ha tre sidor: att effektivisera och automatisera processer och flöden genom att hands-on arbeta med tekniken inom DevOps; att ansvara för onboarding av team till denna samma teknik; att ge support i de verktyg som används.Du har en stark vilja att använda din nyfikenhet för att ständigt hålla dig uppdaterad och vara specialist inom området.   Du kommer att samverka med de flesta av våra team och vara navet för deras DevOps och kommer fullt få utnyttja hela din kompetens.Huvuddelen av vår miljö innefattar Groovy, Jenkins, RHEL, Docker och OpenShift.För att lyckas i denna roll tror vi att du är lika mycket tekniker som människo-människa.CI/CD DevOps-teamet du kommer ingå i tillhör Arbetsförmedlingen IT gemensamma basplattformar men har ett nära samarbete med våra utvecklingsavdelningar.   CI/CD DevOps-teamet du kommer att ingå i tillhör Arbetsförmedlingens avdelning Data Science och Digitala Plattformar.   Ansvar i rollen som CSE    - Implementera och ge support i tekniska lösningar för att möta utvecklingsteamens behov.    - Skripta, automatisera för att underlätta utvecklingsteamens dagliga verksamhet.    - Ansvara och hålla i onboarding för team och teammedlemmar till DevOps-plattformen.    - Arbeta hands-on med byggservrar och underhålla och förbättra byggskript.    - Samarbetet med utvecklingsgrupper och andra aktörer inom Arbetsförmedlingen.    - Optimerad applikationsförvaltning och -drift.   Du har följande kunskaper och kvalifikationer:    - Jenkins, Maven, BitBucket (Git), Jira och Docker    - Scripting inom Perl, PHP, Python eller Bash    - Unix/Linux    - Bekväm med att sätta upp och underhålla verktyg kring byggkedjan.    - Hålla i intern onboarding, utveckla studiematerial.    -  Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom DevOps, exempelvis som utvecklare eller CM    - Goda kunskaper i engelska och svenska i tal och skrift   Som person är du kommunikativ, flexibel, förtroendeingivande och kan på ett pedagogiskt sätt vara en rådgivande person till våra utvecklingsteam.Andra egenskaper som vi värdesätter i rollen är mycket god samarbetsförmåga och ett starkt självledarskap där du ständigt ser nya möjligheter och förbättringspotential.   Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av OpenShift.   Vad du kan förvänta dig   Vi är stolta över vår jordnära och inkluderande kultur.Det märks att vi alla har ett starkt teknikintresse och vi tycker om att umgås på och utanför jobbet.   För oss är det självklart med självledarskap, såklart med support från produktansvarig och din närmsta chef.Vi satsar på kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, genom kurser, konferenser och återkommande teamträffar där vi delar med oss av kunskaper och erfarenhet.   Övrigt   Anställningsformen är tillsvidare med tillträde enligt överenskommelse.Alla våra tjänster startar med en provanställning.Placeringsort Stockholm på nya huvudkontoret i Solna strand, Elektrogatan 4.   Ansökan   Ansök med CV och personligt brev i vårt system.Betygskopior och liknande tas med till en eventuell intervju.Intervjuer kommer att ske löpande, så var snabb med din ansökan.   Vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en myndighet fri från diskriminering.Det är viktigt för oss att all kompetens tas tillvara och vi välkomnar alla sökande.Vi ser positivt på om du har kunskaper i något av våra nationella minoritetsspråk.

headline: DevOps Cloud Engineer for Connected Vehicles (300250)
description.text: Connectivity is changing the way we view and interact with our cars.The entire automotive industry is currently being transformed by connectivity, autonomous driving, electrification, and re-defined business models.Ericsson is taking a leading part in shaping the future of vehicles with our IoT and Connected Vehicle solutions.Ericsson’s Connected Vehicle solutions caters to the global automotive industry’s need for scalability, security and flexibility when connecting products and services.In a rapidly changing landscape, Ericsson helps vehicle manufacturers handle fast-evolving factors with full support for development and solution management.Our connected vehicle solutions enable value-adding services while providing robust and secure global connectivity for Automotive OEMs.Our Connected Vehicle Cloud Platform is based on the latest cloud technologies and enables our customers to realize the full potential of connected vehicles.We are currently working with some of the world’s leading car brands and is rapidly expanding our business and offering in this area. Connected Vehicles Development & Delivery We are now in need of even more DevOps Engineers for our Connected Veicles Development & Delivery organization.This organization is responsible for developing our Connected Vehicle Cloud platform and delivering it to customers all over the world.It is part of the IoT organization within the Business Area Technologies & New Businesses.As a DevOps Engineer in this organization you will be part of a team developing, integrating and deploying our solutions towards the Automotive Industry.You will be working with developing our platform for automating deployment, monitoring, recovery, and capacity planning of the services we deliver.You will be part of the team responsible for ensuring that our as-a-service delivery has world class reliability while being able to quickly evolve according to our customers’ needs. In this role you will:Get the chance to develop with us cutting edge cloud platform services.Be part of an autonomous cross-functional agile team developing, deploying and operating solutions which deliver services to millions of users every dayWork in close contact with our customerscontribute with your background to our ways of working DevOps in as-a-service deliveryGrow in competence in two exciting, fast growing domains: cloud and automotiveExplore with us new technologies in the areas of IoT, cloud and connected vehicles, contributing to Ericsson's technical leadershipContinuously improve our tools for continuous testing, integration, deployment and in support to operations We need to have a variety of profiles in our teams to be able to work efficiently on the full flow.This means that we value candidates with diverse backgrounds, hence the long list below. Nobody can master all: a good candidate will be very strong in some of the items below, while being able to offer something on others. Experiences we hope you can share with us System Integration in Cloud solutions (or at least in virtualized solutions)Implementation of Continuous Integration or Continuous Deployment pipelinesGood SW craftsmanship in more than one languageTesting tools and methodologies (Infra/platform test, test automation, probes, chaos testing..)Extensive Linux experienceWorking experience in DevOps setupOperations, either as operation engineer or in automating operation activities, such as monitoring or incident handling Technology you have probably worked withPublic cloud (certifications are a welcome plus)Solutions for Deployment PipelineContainer technologies, application hosting, understanding of microservice architectures, Service MeshAutomation (we use Terraform and Ansible, but we are open to learn from your experience); Infrastructure as CodeMonitoring and logging toolsDistributed revision control (such as Git) The environment we offer you We are a group of tech enthusiasts, and we build on each other’s interest or your domainWe care for what we create, and we take collective ownership of what we develop: we think DevOps, and we follow our work down to deployment and operationsIn our teams we strive for quality and feel accountable.Also, we celebrate mistakes: we salute the occasional, involuntary cluster wipe-out with a pat on the shoulder and as a great opportunity to learn and growWe believe in Agile as the right approach to handle fast changing prioritiesWe are a multicultural team and organization; living our diversity is something that makes us proud and makes us grow.Also in order to better bridge across differences, we are open to travelling (max 10% of the time)Close customer contact can mean a lot of challenges and pressure, which we handle as a team We look forward to receiving your application in English.Please note we cannot accept applications via email.Primary location for this role: Göteborg, Lindholmen Why is Ericsson a good place to work?Ericsson enables communications service providers to capture the full value of connectivity.The company’s portfolio spans Networks, Digital Services, Managed Services, and Emerging Business and is designed to help our customers go digital, increase efficiency, find new revenue streams, and create new user experiences.Ericsson’s investments in innovation have delivered the benefits of telephony and mobile broadband to billions of people around the world ensuring our solutions – and our customers – are at the forefront of innovation.  We support networks that connect more than 2.5 billion subscribers.With close to 100,000 employees and customers in 180 countries, we combine global scale with technology and service leadership. 40 percent of the world’s mobile traffic is carried over an Ericsson network.

headline: DevOps Engineer for Mullvad VPN // Gothenburg
description.text: We believe that privacy is fundamental to a well-functioning society where norms, ethics, and laws can safely be discussed and challenged.That same society cannot flourish and develop - nor can it exist - without privacy.This is why we provide a VPN service: because privacy is paramount, and apparently, not only to us.The  Mullvad VPN (https://mullvad.net/en/) community is fast growing, and so are we.Now, we have joined forces with Oddwork to search for an experienced DevOps Engineer to advance our back-end services.Perhaps you share our big life goal: to make internet censorship and mass surveillance ineffective.Welcome home then!      As a DevOps Engineer:   Welcome to a small, cohesive team working together to improve existing services as well as develop new ones.Here (and with your experience from), you will deploy, maintain, and manage our back-end services in a stack that is mainly written in Python and Go.      We are looking for you...    You’re driven by the cause and have a huge passion for transparency and security.You know that trust is a fragile thing: difficult to build, easy to lose.And now you want to blaze the trail with us and develop the most secure VPN service ever.Furthermore, you are comfortable using the right tools for the job and open to mastering new skills when necessary.      Our four requirements:      - You have run services on Linux-based systems before and know your way around a terminal   - You have experience with configuration management tools such as Ansible   - You have development experience   - You are fluent in English      Nice but not necessary:      - Experience with running services on bare-metal infrastructure   - Experience in developing services in Python or Go   - Experience with Docker and Kubernetes   - Familiar with Qubes OS      Why Mullvad VPN?   Privacy and freedom.As we breathe for the universal right to privacy, we also believe in having a life outside of work.That’s why we offer flexible working hours, 5000 SEK annually in allowances toward wellness-related activities, 25 days annual paid vacation, pension plan, and the possibility to work remotely.Moreover, we offer opportunities for growth along with company-initiated opportunities to attend various national and international conferences.In addition, we’ll pay for any reading material you feel contributes to your professional development.But what we really offer - how we say hi in the morning, how long it takes to brew a fresh pot of coffee, and what we think best accompanies sparkling wine - all these answers you’ll have to find out for yourself.And we can’t wait for you to make those discoveries!      So, where do we try to liberate the world from?From our new, fresh, crisp (call it what you want!)facilities in the absolute center of Gothenburg.      START: Right away   LOCATION: Gothenburg, Sweden   JOB HOURS: Full-time, permanent      APPLICATION CLOSING DATE: 2019-12-09      Mullvad VPN is a fast growing (+10% in October), value-based, profitable company with remote employees all over the world.68 % developers, 25 % operations/support and 6 % overhead.This is a permanent full-time position which we hope to fill as soon as possible, so don’t wait too long to apply.      We at  Oddwork (http://www.oddwork.se/) believe that the world would become a better place if everyone followed their dreams.That’s why we started our orange revolution - to empower talents and companies to Dare to Dream.As a recruitment and employer branding company, we challenge expectations and match talents with their next career adventure while helping organizations create stronger corporate cultures 7 days a week - 365 days a year.We know for sure that when the right personality and the right culture meet, magic happens!Curious and want to know more?Step into the world of Oddwork by  clicking here!(https://www.facebook.com/oddwork/)

headline: Container Platform Engineer för CI/CD DevOps, Solna
description.text:
Just nu händer mycket runt Arbetsförmedlingen. Men vårt viktiga samhällsuppdrag att stödja arbetssökande och arbetsgivare är detsamma. Nu utvecklar vi nya arbetssätt, nya lösningar och nya sätt att samarbeta med partners och andra aktörer i hela landet. Du kan bidra! Välkommen att söka jobb hos oss!




Är du intresserad av Container-teknik och är du en social person som inspireras av nya utmaningar och innovationer? Då har vi den perfekta positionen för dig!

Som Container Platform Engineer (CPE) arbetar du med CI/CD och DevOps nära tekniken.

Din kompetens kommer att utmanas vid utformning, tillgängliggörande och implementering av förbättrade lösningar för alla Arbetsförmedlingens utvecklingsteam. Du kommer att arbeta med tekniker som Openshift, Linux, och Bitbucket. Vår roll är att tillhandahålla den Container-platform som alla team använder sig av.

Du har lätt för att arbeta självständigt och är en utpräglad lagspelare med hög motivation. Du är innovativ, kundfokuserad och lösningsorienterad samt naturligt nyfiken på området som gör att du är van att följa trender inom DevOps.

Du kommer att samverka med de flesta av våra team och vara navet för deras DevOps och kommer fullt få utnyttja hela din kompetens. Huvuddelen av vår miljö innefattar Groovy, Jenkins, RHEL, Docker och OpenShift. För att lyckas i denna roll tror vi att du är lika mycket tekniker som människo-människa.

CI/CD DevOps-teamet du kommer att ingå i tillhör Arbetsförmedlingens avdelning Data science och Digitala plattformar.

 Vad du ska göra som en CPE

 - Du kommer att managera vår OCP (Openshift Container Platform) PaaS/CaaS-tjänst, såväl som att bygga och underhålla dokumenterade produktions- och förproduktionsmiljöer i vårt OnPrem-moln
 - Äga design, bygga, övervaka och expandera plattformen för att hjälpa till att leverera en fullt utrustad och säker plattform
 - Bygga och underhålla övervakning och loggning av miljön
 - I nära samarbete med utvecklingsteam aktivt stödja dem i deras användning av plattformen, inklusive definition av standarder, best praxis och naturligtvis on-boarding och felsökning
 - Utveckla och managera OCP-specifika gemensamma applikationer (controllers) som gör plattformen smartare

Vi letar efter en-två personer med kompetens och erfarenhet i

 - Arbetat med DevOps nära utvecklingsteam (minst 2 år)
 - Arbetat med automatiseringsverktyg (till exempel Puppet eller Ansible)

 - Erfarenhet i nätverksarkitektur (Cisco/ACI)
 - Relevant högskoleutbildning och/eller flerårig erfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter
 - Goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift är ett måste för tjänsten

Meriterande

 - Användning av Openshift 3.x och container runtimes (Docker) (minst 2 år)

 Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet för rollen.

Övrigt

Anställningsformen är tillsvidare med tillträde enligt överenskommelse. Alla våra tjänster startar med en provanställning. Placeringsort Stockholm på nya huvudkontoret i Solna strand, Elektrogatan 4.

Ansökan

Ansök med CV och personligt brev, på svenska, i vårt rekryteringssystem. Betygskopior och liknande tas med till en eventuell intervju.

Vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en myndighet fri från diskriminering. Det är viktigt för oss att all kompetens tas tillvara och vi välkomnar alla sökande. Vi ser positivt på om du har kunskaper i något av våra nationella minoritetsspråk.

headline: ALTEN IS LOOKING FOR SENIOR DEVOPS ENGINEERS
description.text:
ALTEN Stockholm is growing rapidly within our IT division. For our consultants it means that you will have opportunities to grow with us and also to influence in what directions we are expanding. Your development is our most important focus.

Personal qualities that we value are the ability to act professionally as a consultant and to understand the client’s goals and values. These include; someone who is positive, creative, outgoing and driven, able to create and maintain long lasting relationships with our customers, thrilled by problem solving and able to use creativity and hard work to find new solutions. We are looking for a senior DevOps Engineer - someone with AzureDevOps competence and knowledge.

We believe the suitable candidate would have the following:


 • A strong passion for working with technology and a desire to learn and improve your knowledge
 • A technical education at university or college level, or equivalent work experience
 • Experience in debugging performance problems in a production environment
 • Experience in reading, understand and analyzing server logs
 • Experience in building scalable systems
 • Experience in some of the techniques we use (see below)
 • Passion for software development, scalable architecture and product building
 • Care about code quality, testing and automation
 • A sense of humor, and humility

 It is great if you have experience with:
 • Automation, configuration management, CI/CD, monitoring
 • Working with distributed systems
 • Building modern high performing web-services
 • Hosting on Azure or a similar cloud platform
 • Using Azure DevOps products
 • Debugging [software name] performance bottlenecks
 • Database modeling and performance analysis
 • Network design or troubleshooting
 • Configuration of Continuous Deployment solutions
 • Metrics based alerting
 • Containerization
 • Container orchestration
 • Building system integrations
 • Kubernetes, Azure Function, Service Fabric
 • build the CI/CD pipeline using mature tools such as Azure DevOps or Team City and Octopus
 • Ensure Automation in both application level using (unite testing, Data Testing and Integration testing etc. ),
 • best practices in coding for all the development teams using multiple frameworks such as .Net core
 • ensure that our software products are running smoothly, efficiently, and reliable in our environments and allow scalability when needed



Send an application if it sounds interesting!

headline: ALTEN VÄSTERÅS IS LOOKING FOR DEVOPS ARCHITECTS
description.text:
ALTEN IT Västerås is now looking for a skilled Senior DevOps Engineer or DevOps Architect ready to take the next step in their career. For this long-term assignment, you will play a major role in developing ALTEN’s growth and partnership with one of our biggest clients´ within the Transportation Industry. You will be responsible for coaching a team of skilled Software -and DevOps engineers at ALTEN and have a close collaboration with stakeholders, ALTEN IT Business Unit and ALTEN’s Technical Unit Management Team. Emphasis will be placed on personal suitability, technical knowledge and analytical skills.

Your main responsibilities will include:

- Identifying business requirements of our client, negotiate and design interfaces together with external parties and stakeholders
- Set up of best practice processes and coaching the project teams
- Introduce Continuous Delivery into the teams
- Designing the entire DevOps environment from bottom to top (IoT/embedded – cloud) based on the client´s requirements
- Choosing the system architecture and each individual component of the chosen system
- SW test strategy, the enforcement of it and the creation and maintenance of test environments in which automated tests are executed
- Choosing the technologies for the implementation of each component and connections between the components
- Code review and controlling the architecture during iteration of system release
- Writing project documentation and its support

It is therefore required that you possess the following skills:

- Experience in DevOps in production environment
- Experience in CI/CD (Jenkins, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Spinnaker, Helm)
- Experience in interface design in SOA, loosely coupled architecture at the enterprise level
- Experience in designing Micro Services

- Experience in Enterprise busses / API GW
- Experience in Test Automation
- Experience in IoT Architecture and software stacks

- Master’s degree in science

ABOUT ALTEN
ALTEN is a consulting company that develops and delivers expertise for world-leading companies with consultants in technology, IT and biochemistry. In Sweden, we have over 1 700 employees and work from offices in twelve locations. 
Welcome to read more about us at alten.se

WHAT WE OFFER YOU
Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN! We are driven by making people grow and develop, which is why we offer you the opportunity to work with what you are truly passionate about. At ALTEN, we have a broad range of assignments at most of the leading companies in Sweden in several different sectors, to make it possible for your wishes to come true. We offer both national and international opportunities and together with your coaching manager, you build your career path so you constantly are able to develop and achieve your goals and dreams!
As a consultant at ALTEN, you will get the genuine team feeling at your assignment but also a wonderful togetherness at ALTEN. All activities are of course optional. Work life balance is our top priority. We also have a collective agreement and other benefits like Pension, Insurances and Wellness grants.

We believe in growing together.



We look forward to receiving your application!

headline: Container Software Engineer för CI/CD DevOps, Solna
description.text:
Just nu händer mycket runt Arbetsförmedlingen. Men vårt viktiga samhällsuppdrag att stödja arbetssökande och arbetsgivare är detsamma. Nu utvecklar vi nya arbetssätt, nya lösningar och nya sätt att samarbeta med partners och andra aktörer i hela landet. Du kan bidra! Välkommen att söka jobb hos oss!




I rollen som Container Software Engineer (CSE) är du en länk mellan infrastruktur och systemutveckling.

Du har insett vikten av CI/CD och lockas av de utmaningar som finns där. Ditt arbete kommer att ha tre sidor: att effektivisera och automatisera processer och flöden genom att hands-on arbeta med tekniken inom DevOps; att ansvara för onboarding av team till denna samma teknik; att ge support i de verktyg som används. Du har en stark vilja att använda din nyfikenhet för att ständigt hålla dig uppdaterad och vara specialist inom området.

Du kommer att samverka med de flesta av våra team och vara navet för deras DevOps och kommer fullt få utnyttja hela din kompetens. Huvuddelen av vår miljö innefattar Groovy, Jenkins, RHEL, Docker och OpenShift. För att lyckas i denna roll tror vi att du är lika mycket tekniker som människo-människa. CI/CD DevOps-teamet du kommer att ingå i tillhör Arbetsförmedlingens avdelning Data science och Digitala plattformar.

Ansvar i rollen som CSE

 - Implementera och ge support i tekniska lösningar för att möta utvecklingsteamens behov.
 - Skripta, automatisera för att underlätta utvecklingsteamens dagliga verksamhet.
 - Ansvara och hålla i onboarding för team och teammedlemmar till DevOps-plattformen.
 - Arbeta hands-on med byggservrar och underhålla och förbättra byggskript.
 - Samarbetet med utvecklingsgrupper och andra aktörer inom Arbetsförmedlingen.
 - Optimerad applikationsförvaltning och -drift.

Du har följande kunskaper och kvalifikationer:



 - Unix/Linux
 - Bekväm med att sätta upp och underhålla verktyg kring byggkedjan.
 -  Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom DevOps, exempelvis som utvecklare eller CM
 - Goda kunskaper i engelska och svenska i tal och skrift

Meriterande

 - Erfarenhet av OpenShift.
 - Hålla i intern onboarding, utveckla studiematerial.

Personliga egenskaper

Som person är du kommunikativ, flexibel, förtroendeingivande och kan på ett pedagogiskt sätt vara en rådgivande person till våra utvecklingsteam. Andra egenskaper som vi värdesätter i rollen är mycket god samarbetsförmåga och ett starkt självledarskap där du ständigt ser nya möjligheter och förbättringspotential.

Vad du kan förvänta dig

Vi är stolta över vår jordnära och inkluderande kultur. Det märks att vi alla har ett starkt teknikintresse och vi tycker om att umgås på och ibland utanför jobbet.

För oss är det självklart med självledarskap, såklart med support från produktansvarig och din närmsta chef. Vi satsar på kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, genom kurser, konferenser och återkommande teamträffar där vi delar med oss av kunskaper och erfarenhet.

Övrigt

Anställningsformen är tillsvidare med tillträde enligt överenskommelse. Alla våra tjänster startar med en provanställning. Placeringsort Stockholm på nya huvudkontoret i Solna strand, Elektrogatan 4.

Ansökan

Ansök med CV och personligt brev i vårt system. Betygskopior och liknande tas med till en eventuell intervju. Intervjuer kommer att ske löpande, så var snabb med din ansökan.

Vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en myndighet fri från diskriminering. Det är viktigt för oss att all kompetens tas tillvara och vi välkomnar alla sökande. Vi ser positivt på om du har kunskaper i något av våra nationella minoritetsspråk.

headline: ALTEN VÄSTERÅS IS LOOKING FOR DEVOPS ARCHITECTS
description.text:
ALTEN IT Västerås is now looking for a skilled Senior DevOps Engineer or DevOps Architect ready to take the next step in their career. For this long-term assignment, you will play a major role in developing ALTEN’s growth and partnership with one of our biggest clients´ within the Transportation Industry. You will be responsible for coaching a team of skilled Software -and DevOps engineers at ALTEN and have a close collaboration with stakeholders, ALTEN IT Business Unit and ALTEN’s Technical Unit Management Team. Emphasis will be placed on personal suitability, technical knowledge and analytical skills.

Your main responsibilities will include:

- Identifying business requirements of our client, negotiate and design interfaces together with external parties and stakeholders
- Set up of best practice processes and coaching the project teams
- Introduce Continuous Delivery into the teams
- Designing the entire DevOps environment from bottom to top (IoT/embedded – cloud) based on the client´s requirements
- Choosing the system architecture and each individual component of the chosen system
- SW test strategy, the enforcement of it and the creation and maintenance of test environments in which automated tests are executed
- Choosing the technologies for the implementation of each component and connections between the components
- Code review and controlling the architecture during iteration of system release
- Writing project documentation and its support

It is therefore required that you possess the following skills:

- Experience in DevOps in production environment
- Experience in CI/CD (Jenkins, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Spinnaker, Helm)
- Experience in interface design in SOA, loosely coupled architecture at the enterprise level
- Experience in designing Micro Services

- Experience in Enterprise busses / API GW
- Experience in Test Automation
- Experience in IoT Architecture and software stacks

- Master’s degree in science

ABOUT ALTEN
ALTEN is a consulting company that develops and delivers expertise for world-leading companies with consultants in technology, IT and biochemistry. In Sweden, we have over 1 700 employees and work from offices in twelve locations. 
Welcome to read more about us at alten.se

WHAT WE OFFER YOU
Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN! We are driven by making people grow and develop, which is why we offer you the opportunity to work with what you are truly passionate about. At ALTEN, we have a broad range of assignments at most of the leading companies in Sweden in several different sectors, to make it possible for your wishes to come true. We offer both national and international opportunities and together with your coaching manager, you build your career path so you constantly are able to develop and achieve your goals and dreams!
As a consultant at ALTEN, you will get the genuine team feeling at your assignment but also a wonderful togetherness at ALTEN. All activities are of course optional. Work life balance is our top priority. We also have a collective agreement and other benefits like Pension, Insurances and Wellness grants.

We believe in growing together.



We look forward to receiving your application!

headline: DevOps leader to our Certificate Management team
description.text:
In the ever-expanding world of digitizing we secure the new society that emerge. Nexus’ Smart ID solutions and IoT platforms are transforming how we perceive trusted identities for people and things. That journey begins with our awesome engineering teams. For the next step in this journey we are looking for a leader who wants to help us move deeper into the clouds.

Nexus PKI platform is used for people and things all over the world, in  root CCAs (https://www.nexusgroup.com/controller-of-certifying-authorities-cca/), in  next generation infrastructure (https://www.nexusgroup.com/nexus-enables-seamless-vehicle-charging-through-hubject/) and to  secure civil services (https://www.nexusgroup.com/trusted-electronic-identities-for-it-devices-secures-the-future-of-democracy-in-stockholm/) all around the world. 



We are offering you a chance to be part of a product/service company, just when the tech is starting to take off. Billions of IoT devices, Zero trust and Deep fake put pressure on the society to evolve the next generation secure identities, and we are in the midst of it. And you can be in the middle of Nexus, furthering our core portfolio.

This role is based in our HQ in southern Stockholm (Telefonplan) but we are a global player with 300 employees, distributed over Europe and Asia.

What will you be doing at Nexus?

This is a multi-function role; your prime objective will be to be a great leader for a great team. This include day-to-day stuff like stand-up and sprint planning, long term strategy, be part of the customer journey and employee life cycle.

This part depends on who you are. We are a company in transformation and growth, you will be able to contribute within many different areas. This could be as an Agile coach, Java developer, DevOps engineer driving the Azure DevOps journey, working with Change- and IT management. Or be a PKI expert supporting the organisation with your now-how. Your profile and passions will guide this part.

One important part of your mission will be to continue the SaaS adventure. We already have plenty of customers who consume our products as a service (you might have heard of a  pretty big vehicle manufacturer (https://www.nexusgroup.com/volkswagen-premieres-all-new-golf-with-v2x-capabilities/) and their smart car / V2X solutions), but the lion part is still consumed as an on-prem solution. This is changing fast, and we need to change with the industry.

Who are you?

You can have acquired your greatness in many ways. We are not the kind of company that says that you HAVE to have xx years of experience in a specific technology. But we have some ideas about what we do think is important. We also think you have some relevant leader experience and that you enjoy being a leader with employee responsibility.

As stated above, we also want you to work hands-on within some areas. Therefore we want you to be really good in an area other than Management. This area should of course touched upon something DevOps:ie, but we are flexible. We also want you to have experience in cloud services and maybe even of the transformation from on-prem to SaaS.

This will give you the persistence and the drive to always working toward best practice, taking pride in the solution you and your team provide for our amazing customers and it will keep you curious and open-minded to new ways of working.

As a person we think you are a bit Zen, you are a force of nature when it comes to facilitate change, but more in the way of a drip of water making a ravine than a hurricane. You have reach the level of experience where you know yourself as a humane as well as a leader. You don’t need to be the expert in the room (believe us, you seldom will be. 

But the fika-language in the Stockholm office is Swedish so for your comfort it could be good if you know some Swedish as well.

And one more thing, we are a security company and our costumers safety is very important to us, and this role will be subjected to a back ground check for the final candidate.

headline: ALTEN IS LOOKING FOR A COMMITTED DEVOPS ENGINEER
description.text: Are you a skilled and committed DevOps Engineer looking for new opportunities?Would you like to be part of a dynamic environment where you can build on to your previous experiences?Then we could be the right employer for you!      ALTEN Gothenburg is growing rapidly within our IT division and we are looking for experienced and dedicated engineers.ALTEN's consultants help shape the world's leading technology challenges.We are involved in the development of everything from future airplanes, next generation mobile networks, radiation knives in medical technology and autonomous transport solutions to the latest media and game development technologies.      WHAT WE OFFER YOU   Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN!We are driven by making people grow and develop, which is why we offer you the opportunity to work with what you are truly passionate about.At ALTEN, we have a broad range of assignments at most of the leading companies in Sweden in several different sectors, to make it possible for your wishes to come true.We offer both national and international opportunities and together with your coaching manager, you build your career path so you constantly are able to develop and achieve your goals and dreams!      As a consultant at ALTEN, you will get the genuine team feeling at your assignment but also a wonderful togetherness at ALTEN.All activities are of course optional.Work life balance is our top priority.We also have a collective agreement and other benefits like Pension, Insurances and Wellness grants.      Mandatory qualifications:   - Java   - Maven   - Linux and Windows   - Git   - Jenkins   - Scripting languages such as Bash and Python      Preferred qualifications:   - CI/CD   - Docker and kubernetes or openshift   - Cloud (AWS, Azure)   - Cygwin   - Agile development methods like Scrum            About ALTEN   ALTEN is a consulting company that develops and delivers expertise for world-leading companies with consultants in technology, IT and biochemistry.We are located in over 20 countries, have our headquarter in Paris and have more than 28,000 employees, of which 88 percent are engineers.In Sweden, we have over 1,700 employees and work from offices in twelve locations.Our clients are found in industries such as Automotive, Energy, Telecom, Industry, Aerospace & Defence and Life Science, where our consultants operate throughout the product development chain. description.text: Hos Sprinta är energin hög, och det kreativa utrymmet utan gränser.Inom koncernen levererar vi eftertraktade produkter och tjänster för över 100 miljoner kronor till privat och offentlig verksamhet i Sverige.Men resan har bara börjat, mot nya höjder med helt fantastiska framtidsprodukter:      Sprinta Innovation Division (SID) är vårt Eldorado för dig som är superintresserad av DotNet      Sprinta Embedded Division (SED) är vårt Shangri-La för dig som brinner för inbyggda system      Vi utvecklar framtiden! Skicka in din ansökan och kickstarta 2020 med oss på Sprinta!

headline: Platform Engineer with a soft spot for DevOps
description.text: Open position: Platform Engineer with DevOps focus   1 full-time permanent (part-time negotiable) position as Platform Engineer with a soft spot for DevOps.You will set up and maintain our tools in the build chain for Addressya’s products, and we think you are someone with a deep interest in improving developer happiness and efficiency through automation.You will make sure all product development tools work together as a whole.    Besides a monthly salary, you will be able to take part in our staff options program (Sw: personaloptioner).The place of work is the company’s headquarter in central Stockholm.    Skills and requirements   We would like you to be skilled and have experience from the below:   Cloud infrastructure CI/CD, in particular for mobile apps and APIsUtilizing metrics to drive improvementImproving software development productivityComputer science at the university level   Application (deadlines etc)   Interviews will be held continuously as applications come in.Successful applicants can start immediately or as soon as possible.       Working at Addressya   We build our teams with “team makers”, who take full responsibility for own work, the team and the company objectives as a whole.You are never alone at Addressya, asking for help comes naturally to you, as does responding when others need your help.You enjoy using your skills and ideas to help to remove obstacles and bottlenecks for others and within the organisation.   If you are looking for a challenge, make a real difference and grow every day, this is the place for you.We provide a fun and friendly environment, where working outside your comfort zone is safe, challenging and fun.    About Addressya    Addressya AB is a Swedish company with an ambitious goal to improve a billion lives by providing access to opportunities, inclusion, partnerships, and trade through improved addressing.The solution was created in response to the fact that 4 billion people, businesses and governments worldwide suffer from the lack of addresses!    Addressya enables everyone to create a precise, complete and easy to use address and share it with full control over their own data.For individuals it will always be free, to businesses, we offer Addressing as a Service that gives companies access to good quality address data for increased transparency and efficiency.   Addressya is preparing for scale in 2020 and is expanding our team.The current team consists of 13 people, 8 women and 5 men, and 9 nationalities.The headquarter is located in central Stockholm, Sweden, which is also the place of work.We have a developers’ office in Kampala, Uganda, and a sales branch in Kigali, Rwanda, which is the first market that Addressya launched in.

headline: Dedikerad och Proaktiv DevOps Engineer sökes till Offerta
description.text: Vår kund Offerta är på en spännande resa där man nu omstrukturerar sin utvecklingsorganisation och dess arbetssätt.Det som tidigare varit ett stort techteam blir nu istället tre produktteam.För att framgångsrikt lyckas med detta samt möjliggöra för respektive team att utveckla sin produkt autonomt söker vi därför en dedikerad och proaktiv DevOps Engineer som brinner för teknisk utveckling och som vill ta sig an utmaningen att driva arbetet framåt.      Rollen   I rollen som DevOps Engineer kommer du ha en övergripande roll och arbeta med allt som rör hosting, nätverk, övervakning, prestanda, säkerhet och deploy pipes.Du finns tillgänglig för alla Offertas tre produktteam där du är den som säkerställer att respektive team kan utveckla sin produkt autonomt.Detta genom att exempelvis automatisera hanteringen av utvecklings- och testmiljöer, rättighetshantering, deployment, domäncertifikat-konfigurering osv.      Du arbetar både på operativ och strategisk nivå och ingår i Offertas tech-team som idag består av totalt 18 personer etablerade i roller som Net-utvecklare, frontendutvecklare, ML-utvecklare, analytiker, produktutvecklare och projektledare.I rollen arbetar du både självständigt och i nära samarbete med Offertas Lead Data Engineer och Lead Developer.Som DevOps Engineer på Offerta har du även en viktig roll i att vara med att kontinuerligt effektivisera arbetssätt genom att vara ajour kring, och dra nytta av, den tekniska utvecklingen globalt.Du kommer snabbt få ett stort ansvar och för rätt person finns möjligheten att växa och utvecklas i din roll.      Day to day       - Hosting på Azure eller liknande molnplattformar    - Optimera existerande system för skalbarhet och bygga storskalig infrastruktur    - Bygga CI/CD-pipeline med moderna verktyg såsom Azure DevOps    - Databasmodelering och prestandaanalys    - Nätverksdesign och felsökning    - Konfigurering av lösningar för continuous deployments    - Nyckeltalsbaserade larm    - Automation, configuration management, CI/CD, monitoring    - Kubernetes    - AD/AzureAD    - Budgetansvar för Hosting & DevOps.      Vem är du?   Du har minst 3-6 års erfarenhet från roller med liknande arbetsuppgifter och ansvarområden.För att lyckas i rollen bör du dessutom ha erfarenhet av och kunskap i Windows, Linux, Powershell, Python, Bash, Azure och AD/Azure-AD Network.Som person har du ett genuint tekniskt intresse samt är noggrann och analytisk till din natur.Du är också driven och proaktiv vilket bidrar till att du ständigt utvecklas och kommer framåt i ditt arbete.Du är en kommunikativ person som trivs bra med att arbeta nära utvecklare som brinner för teknik och lockas av att arbeta för ett teknikintensivt bolag som hela tiden strävar efter att ligga i framkant.Vidare behärskar du svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.      Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med start omgående.Connecta med oss idag om du tycker att det här låter intressant, med eller utan CV, på det sätt som passar dig bäst.Så länge vi får en bra bild av dig och vem du är så tar vi det därifrån.Intervjuer och urval sker löpande.Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!            Offerta grundades 2008 och är Sveriges största tjänsteförmedlare som gör det enkelt att hitta, jämföra och välja tjänsteföretag.Offerta ägs i majoritet av Alvén & Didrikson AB, och har idag ett femtiotal medarbetare.Offerta letar alltid efter drivna talanger som är engagerade och målinriktade.Söker du en kreativ arbetsplats som dagligen erbjuder utmaningar och upplevelser är chansen stor att du är rätt person för oss.Läs gärna mer om oss på offerta.se

headline: Senior Full stack Developer .Net and Java Devops.
description.text:
Hi,

We are looking for .Net and Java devops professional - Stockholm Location(Permanent position).



·        Technical expert, senior developer and operational expert for critical systems that are crucial for the payment transactions

·        Part of a team responsible for the software development, design, code, stability and performance

·        Designing, deploying and building secure, stable and scalable systems in a fast pace environment as per the business requirements

·        Assisting in setting up and maintaining the internal development environment – full software development lifecycle

·        Develop new features and extending existing features of the client’s systems

·        Pfovide solutions to techniveal problems

·        Troubleshoot problems and provide timely resolutions

·        Perform code reviews

·        Write thorough technical specs

·        Build and configure delivery environments supporting CD/CI tools using an Agile delivery methodology.

Expected Profile:

·        A professional developer with hands on experience and solid knowledge of .net/C# programming, rest, soap

·        Experience in all aspects of the sw development life cycle and system integration

·        Full knowledge of version controllability to write unit tests, refactor existing code and work with existing codebases

·        Proficient in schema design and sql

·        Very good knowledge about client-server programming, wpf framework, application integration, data modelling, git/Bit Bucket, Jenkins. SonarQube. ELK, Docker., TDD

·        Ability to troubleshoot problems and provide timely resolutions

·        Hands on experience with expert knowledge in either AWS or Azure resources and services

·        Experience working with agile team methods

·        Experience of TDD and CI/CD

·        Knowledge of accepted software engineering practices for the full software development lifecycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing and operations

·        Stroing analytical and coding skills

·        Excellent communication skills

·        Ability to prioritize and manage time effectively

·        Ability to adapt in a dynamic work environment and make independent decisions

·        Above all, the person must be positive and have a team mentality

·        Experience at any of the following fields is merit: POS systems, Payments, JS (React), Java, Spring Boot, Spring Batch, Intellij, Hibernate/JPA, Maven, Tomcat, Xamarin
